translation.en: [man] Breakfast!
translation.zh: 吃早餐了！

translation.en: Charlie, you're gonna be late, mate.
translation.zh: 查理 你要迟到了

translation.en: I'm cereal.
translation.zh: 我要麦片

translation.en: I'm pancakes.
translation.zh: 我要松饼

translation.en: Toast with jam, no butter.
translation.zh: 吐司加果酱 不加黄油

translation.en: Toast and marmalade.
translation.zh: 吐司加橘子酱

translation.en: Okay. Toast with, uh, jam, that's there.
translation.zh: 好 吐司加果酱 给

translation.en: -And one cereal. -[girl] Dad!
translation.zh: -还有一碗麦片-爸爸！

translation.en: -Buster. Buster, what… What's that? -Lolly.
translation.zh: -巴斯特 那是什么？-棒棒糖

translation.en: -We don't have lollies for breakfast. -Why?
translation.zh: 我们早餐不吃棒棒糖 对吧？ -为什么？-为什么？

translation.en: Why? Because I have made you some lovely bacon.
translation.zh: -为什么？-为什么？ 因为我给你做了美味的培根

translation.en: Well, I'm vegan now.
translation.zh: 我现在吃素了

translation.en: Course you are.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: Lunch box, lunch box.
translation.zh: 午餐盒

translation.en: No. Guys. No. Sorry.
translation.zh: 不 各位 不 抱歉

translation.en: What've we said? We don't have hamsters at the dinner table, do we? Thank you.
translation.zh: 我们怎么说的？不把仓鼠带上餐桌 是吧？谢谢

translation.en: All right, thank you.
translation.zh: 好 谢谢

translation.en: We've got about ten minutes left.
translation.zh: 我们只剩十分钟了

translation.en: I need you to get your coats, your school bags, and let's go.
translation.zh: 你们去拿外套 书包 我们走了

translation.en: Quick! [claps]
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: Guys, we're gonna be late!
translation.zh: 各位 我们要迟到了！

translation.en: Charlie, thank you.
translation.zh: 查理 谢谢你

translation.en: Rosie, don't forget your sandwich. That's yours. Buster, come here.
translation.zh: 萝茜 别忘了你的三明治 那是你的 巴斯特 过来

translation.en: Look, just stay there. Put your arm through there.
translation.zh: 别动 把手伸进去

translation.en: Doesn't matter. Go. Here, take your hat.
translation.zh: 算了 去吧 给 帽子拿着！

translation.en: Buster, come… Where's your shoe?
translation.zh: 巴斯特 你的鞋呢？

translation.en: Buster! It doesn't matter. Go, quick.
translation.zh: 巴斯特！算了 快走吧

translation.en: It's here! I've got it. I've got the shoe.
translation.zh: 在这里 我找到鞋了

translation.en: -Ah, Mr. Cunningham. -Yes.
translation.zh: 坎宁翰先生 -是-这是您的包裹

translation.en: -I've got a parcel for you. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -是-这是您的包裹 谢谢

translation.en: -Sorry, I need you to sign. -I don't have a pen.
translation.zh: -抱歉 我需要你签字-我没有笔

translation.en: -I have a pencil. -Ah, no, can't use pencil.
translation.zh: 我有铅笔 不行 不能用铅笔

translation.en: -I've got a crayon. -No, crayon's too waxy. Sorry.
translation.zh: -我有蜡笔-不行 蜡笔太蜡了 抱歉

translation.en: -A felt-tip. -Gotta be black Biro.
translation.zh: -我有签字笔-必须是黑色圆珠笔

translation.en: -I don't have a black Biro. -I have.
translation.zh: -我没有黑色圆珠笔-我有

translation.en: You can use that. You only had to ask. That's it, and we just need the date
translation.zh: 你可以用这个 你问就行了 好了 还需要日期…

translation.en: of your birth.
translation.zh: 出生日期

translation.en: -Okay. -Lovely.
translation.zh: -好-太好了

translation.en: Oh, and we got to do a photo for proof of delivery.
translation.zh: 还得拍张照片 证明送达

translation.en: Okay, kids. Here we go.
translation.zh: 好 孩子们 拍了

translation.en: That's it, kids. Nice big smile.
translation.zh: 好 孩子们 美美地笑

translation.en: And we're done.
translation.zh: 行了

translation.en: Lovely. Think you're gonna enjoy that. And you, kids.
translation.zh: 很好 我想你会喜欢的你们也是 孩子们

translation.en: Haven't read it though, haven't read it.
translation.zh: 我还没看过呢

translation.en: All right, listen, everyone get in the car. Thank you.
translation.zh: 好了 大家上车去 谢谢

translation.en: Rosie, will you get the door, please?
translation.zh: 萝茜 你把门带上吗？

translation.en: Dad, you forgot the costume for the Christmas concert!
translation.zh: 爸 你忘了圣诞音乐会的服装

translation.en: I need a cake for the Christmas bake!
translation.zh: 我需要个圣诞义卖的蛋糕

translation.en: You said you would do the reading with me.
translation.zh: 你不是说要陪我读书吗？

translation.en: Don't your teachers do the reading?
translation.zh: 你的老师不给你读书吗？

translation.en: -I feel all wobbly. -Off you go.
translation.zh: -我在打颤-快去吧

translation.en: -Quick as you can. Love you! Bye! -[kids] Love you. Bye!
translation.zh: -都快点 爱你们！-再见！

translation.en: Ooh, sorry. Morning, children.
translation.zh: 早上好 抱歉 -早上好 孩子们 又迟到了-你好 再见！好谢谢

translation.en: -Late again. -Hello. Bye-bye! Okay, thank you.
translation.zh: -早上好 孩子们 又迟到了-你好 再见！好谢谢

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Not acceptable!
translation.zh: 这不行

translation.en: So time is of the essence, people. I need loyalty.
translation.zh: 时间很重要 各位 我需要忠诚

translation.en: I need people with no distractions. I need commitment.
translation.zh: 我需要完全专注的人 我需要投入

translation.en: I need 110% commitment.
translation.zh: 我需要110％的投入

translation.en: -How much commitment do I need? -110% commitment.
translation.zh: -我需要多投入？-110％

translation.en: Oh, welcome! Thank you for joining us. Do take a seat.
translation.zh: 欢迎 谢谢你加入我们 坐吧

translation.en: Sorry, it was the school run. You know kids.
translation.zh: 抱歉 送孩子去学校你知道孩子什么样

translation.en: [laughs] Really, was it? I don't care.
translation.zh: 真的吗？我不在乎 我是做生意的

translation.en: I'm running a business, and in business, kids don't count!
translation.zh: 真的吗？我不在乎 我是做生意的 在生意里 孩子不重要

translation.en: Now, where was I?
translation.zh: 我说到哪了？

translation.en: The Emblem deal needs to be done by the end of the year.
translation.zh: 恩布勒姆交易 必须在今年底前完成

translation.en: We want our pitch to outpitch every other pitch out there. Woo!
translation.zh: 我们的推介 要胜过其他所有推介

translation.en: Cunningham. People seem to think you have a certain charm.
translation.zh: 坎宁翰 大家似乎都觉得你有魅力

translation.en: Therefore, you will present the final pitch.
translation.zh: 因此 由你来做最后的推介

translation.en: Wait, sorry. When exactly do you think that I would be pitching?
translation.zh: 等等 抱歉你设想我什么时候进行推介？

translation.en: I get very busy with the run-up to Christmas with kids and…
translation.zh: 圣诞节之前 我总是很忙因为孩子们…

translation.en: 24th December.
Twenty… But that's Christmas Eve!
translation.zh: 2…可那是平安夜！

translation.en: You had better prioritize, then. Your job or Santa coming down the chimney.
translation.zh: 那你最好想清楚轻重缓急了 你的工作 还是圣诞老人爬烟囱

translation.en: Right. Class dismissed.
translation.zh: 好 下课

translation.en: Cunningham.
translation.zh: 坎宁翰

translation.en: I can't stress to you how important this account is for us.
translation.zh: 我无法强调这个客户对我们有多重要

translation.en: Jobs are on the line.
translation.zh: 事关饭碗

translation.en: Your job.
translation.zh: 你的饭碗

translation.en: Okay, I know, and I won't let you down. I promise I'll make it work.
translation.zh: 我知道 我不会让你失望的我保证我能办妥

translation.en: Is that a hamster?
translation.zh: 那是仓鼠吗？

translation.en: Yes. That's my son's lunch box. Buster. Always forgets his sandwiches.
translation.zh: 对 那是我儿子巴斯特的午餐盒他总落下他的三明治

translation.en: Ham sandwich, hamster sandwich. You know what kids are like.
translation.zh: 火腿三明治 仓鼠三明治你知道小孩子什么样

translation.en: No, I don't, because in business, kids don't count.
translation.zh: 不 我不知道 因为在生意上孩子不重要

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Okay. We can do the pitch.
translation.zh: 好 我们能做到推介

translation.en: We can do it. We'll make it work. Okay.
translation.zh: 我们可以的 我们能做到

translation.en: Come on, then.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: There you go. You'll be safe in there.
translation.zh: 好了 你在这里很安全

translation.en: -[exhales] -Hey, Matty.
translation.zh: 嘿 马特

translation.en: -What's that? -A letter from a lawyer, I think.
translation.zh: -那是什么？-应该是律师函

translation.en: Boy! What you done now, bro? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你做了什么 兄弟？

translation.en: I've been left a… gift or an inheritance.
translation.zh: 有人给我留了礼物或遗产

translation.en: Who from?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: -That's odd. It's from my dad. -Your dad?
translation.zh: -奇怪 是我爸送的-你爸爸？

translation.en: No, it's fine. I didn't really know him, to be honest.
translation.zh: 不 没关系 我其实并不了解他

translation.en: "Dear, Mr. Cunningham, I've been instructed by your father
translation.zh: “亲爱的坎宁翰先生我受你父亲的指示

translation.en: to give you this letter containing the keys to…"
translation.zh: 寄给你这封信 内含钥匙 是用来…”

translation.en: -"Please visit this website." -Visit the website! Come on!
translation.zh: -“请登录此网站”-快登录那个网站啊！

translation.en: "Mistletoe…"
translation.zh: “槲寄生…”

translation.en: Is that yours… to keep?
translation.zh: 那是给你的吗？

translation.en: [Matt] I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Yo, that looks like it's worth a fortune, you know?
translation.zh: 那看起来很值钱 你知道吗？

translation.en: I can't deal with this right now. We've got so much work to do.
translation.zh: 我现在没法应付这事我们有那么工作呢

translation.en: Hey. Wait a minute, man.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: This is exactly what you need to nail the pitch.
translation.zh: 这正是你完成推介所需要的

translation.en: Peace and quiet in the countryside.
translation.zh: 乡下的安宁与平静

translation.en: Just you and the rolling hills. No distractions.
translation.zh: 只有你和连绵起伏的山 不会分心

translation.en: No more Cruella de Vil Fletcher on your back.
translation.zh: 再没有魔女弗莱彻盯着你了

translation.en: Just you and hamster, and the lovely, friendly countryfolk.
translation.zh: 只有你和仓鼠 和可爱友好的乡下人

translation.en: It's a win.
translation.zh: 这是好事

translation.en: It's a win-win.
translation.zh: 是双赢

translation.en: Triple win, bro.
translation.zh: 三赢 兄弟

translation.en: You see it, yeah?
translation.zh: 你明白了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, you see it.
translation.zh: 你明白了

translation.en: -Are you okay, Daddy? -Yeah, I'm fine.
translation.zh: -你没事吧 爸爸？-我没事

translation.en: -Have you brushed your teeth? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你刷牙了吗？-嗯

translation.en: -What are you looking at? -[Buster] It's a farm, silly.
translation.zh: -你在看什么？-这是个农场 傻瓜

translation.en: -Where is the farm? -It's in a place called Cobbledon.
translation.zh: -这农场在哪里？-在一个叫柯布顿的地方

translation.en: Can we go to the farm, Dad?
translation.zh: 我们能去农场吗 爸爸？

translation.en: Are there animals there?
translation.zh: 那里有动物吗？

translation.en: Yeah, like Fleece.
translation.zh: 对 就像羊毛毛

translation.en: -Please can we go to the farm? -Yeah, please?
translation.zh: -我们能去农场吗？-好吗？

translation.en: -Please! -For Christmas.
translation.zh: -拜托！-去过圣诞

translation.en: We can't go for Christmas.
translation.zh: 我们不能圣诞节去

translation.en: How will Santa know where to deliver all your presents?
translation.zh: 不然圣诞老人怎么知道把你们礼物送哪里？

translation.en: Mum would let us.
translation.zh: 妈妈就会让我们去

translation.en: [Matt] The thing is, Mummy isn't here anymore.
translation.zh: 问题是 妈咪已经不在了

translation.en: But you said Mummy was always with us.
translation.zh: 但你说妈妈永远跟我们在一起

translation.en: -You said she was always in our hearts. -Yeah, you say that every day.
translation.zh: -你说她永远在我们心里-对 你每天都这么说

translation.en: No, and she is. She is in our hearts.
translation.zh: 对 她的确在我们心中

translation.en: It's just Mummy can't make the decisions anymore.
translation.zh: 但妈咪不能再做决定了

translation.en: That has to be Daddy's job.
translation.zh: 这只能由爸爸来做

translation.en: Well, hang on, no, 'cause… Oh, wait a minute. She's coming in.
translation.zh: 等等 等等 她出现了

translation.en: She's coming through, and she's saying that she still is the boss of me,
translation.zh: 她显灵了 她说 我还是得听她的

translation.en: and we should go to the farm.
translation.zh: 我们应该去农场

translation.en: [kids] Yeah!
translation.zh: 好啊！

translation.en: But first I have to clear it with the school.
translation.zh: 但首先 我得跟学校请假

translation.en: [teacher] A village school?
translation.zh: 乡村学校？

translation.en: Mr. Cunningham, how can we be sure
translation.zh: 坎宁翰先生 我们怎么确定

translation.en: that they will provide an adequate education?
translation.zh: 他们能提供足够的教育？

translation.en: It can't be any worse than here! [laughs]
translation.zh: 那边总不会比这边更差！

translation.en: I am seeing quite dysfunctional behavior in all five of your children.
translation.zh: 你五个孩子都有不正常的行为

translation.en: You know, Rosie is…
translation.zh: 萝茜…

translation.en: She's really not herself. She's very quiet.
translation.zh: 她很不像自己 她很安静

translation.en: I could be forgiven for thinking that sometimes she is asleep in my lesson.
translation.zh: 我甚至觉得 她有时在我课上睡觉

translation.en: Charlie has been kicking boys and girls and writing quite rude things.
translation.zh: 查理总踢其他男生和女生还写下了脏话

translation.en: I understand that you've been through a difficult situation,
translation.zh: 我知道你经历了困难的处境

translation.en: but I fear that they are falling behind in their work.
translation.zh: 我知道你经历了困难的处境 但我担心他们的学习滞后了

translation.en: Well, don't be too hard on yourself about that,
translation.zh: 别太为此苛责自己 好吗？

translation.en: because I know that if you work really hard,
translation.zh: 因为我知道 如果你努力工作

translation.en: find your mojo, next year, these kids, they're gonna excel.
translation.zh: 找到窍门 明年 孩子们会做得很好

translation.en: So thank you. And Merry Christmas!
translation.zh: 谢谢你了 圣诞快乐

translation.en: Wetsuit? Okay. Fine.
translation.zh: 好 行

translation.en: [exhales] Are you absolutely sure about this?
translation.zh: 你真的确定吗？

translation.en: What if you get there and this farm doesn't exist?
translation.zh: 如果你去了这个农场根本不存在呢？ 那我就转身直接回来

translation.en: -I will turn around and come back. -Just manage your expectations, won't you?
translation.zh: 那我就转身直接回来 别抱太高期望 好吗？

translation.en: Your dad was full of secrets and surprises. Not all of them good.
translation.zh: 你爸爸充满了秘密和惊喜 并不都是好的

translation.en: -Take care. -I'll call you.
translation.zh: -保重-好 我打给你

translation.en: Drive carefully.
translation.zh: 小心开车

translation.en: -[Matt] Bye, Mum. -Bye! Have a lovely time!
translation.zh: -再见 妈-再见 孩子 -再见！玩得开心！-再见奶奶

translation.en: [kid] Bye, Granny!
translation.zh: -再见！玩得开心！-再见奶奶

translation.en: [Rosie] It's so cool!
translation.zh: 太酷了！

translation.en: [Buster] Look, Dad, baa-sheep!
translation.zh: 看 爸爸 咩咩羊

translation.en: No, it's just sheep, Buster.
translation.zh: 不 只是羊 巴斯特

translation.en: -Look, Dad, moo-cows! -No, we just say "cows," son.
translation.zh: 看 爸爸 哞哞牛！ 不 就是“牛” 儿子

translation.en: [Rosie] You just missed the farm sign! It said Mistletoe Farm back there!
translation.zh: 爸爸 你刚刚开过了农场牌子！那上面写着槲寄生农场

translation.en: -What? Where? -[Rosie] You missed the sign.
translation.zh: -什么？哪里？-你开过了刚刚的牌子

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me? If you told me, I could've-- [yells]
translation.zh: 你们怎么不说？如果你们早说…

translation.en: What are you doing bringing a horse down a narrow road?
translation.zh: 你怎么在这么窄的路上骑马？

translation.en: It's the countryside.
translation.zh: 这里是乡下

translation.en: Vehicles give way to animals in the countryside.
translation.zh: 在乡下 车给动物让路

translation.en: Have you read the signs?
translation.zh: 你看到牌子了吗？

translation.en: Okay, fine. Is the horse okay?
translation.zh: 好吧 马没事吧？

translation.en: Yes. No thanks to you.
translation.zh: 没事 可不是因为你

translation.en: So much for the friendly countryfolk!
translation.zh: 还说乡下友好呢

translation.en: [Matt] I think this is it.
translation.zh: 我想就是这里了

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: [Rosie] It says Mistletoe Farm right there.
translation.zh: 那里写着槲寄生农场

translation.en: [Matt] We have arrived.
translation.zh: 我们到了

translation.en: [Buster] Whoa! Look at that!
translation.zh: 哇！看啊！

translation.en: [Violet] It's so cute!
translation.zh: 好可爱

translation.en: Is it our farm, Dad?
translation.zh: 这是我们的农场吗 爸爸？

translation.en: -[Matt] I think so. -Look, Dad! More baa-sheep!
translation.zh: 我想是的 看 爸爸！又是咩咩羊

translation.en: -No, it's not baa-sheep. It's just sheep. -Sheep poo!
translation.zh: 不 巴斯特 不是咩咩羊 就是羊 羊粪

translation.en: [Matt] Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: What is that smell?
translation.zh: 那是什么味儿？

translation.en: -I think it's you, Buster. -It's not me!
translation.zh: -是你吧 巴斯特-不是我！

translation.en: -Well, someone likes eggs. -I think I know why, Daddy.
translation.zh: -某人好喜欢吃鸡蛋-我想我知道原因了 爸爸

translation.en: -It's so cute. Can we keep it? -No, we can't keep it. Come here.
translation.zh: -好可爱 我们可以留着吗？-不 不能留着 过来

translation.en: Listen, don't panic. That's it. We're fine. We'll take it… Oh God! No!
translation.zh: 听着 别慌 就这样没事了 我们把它…天啊！不！

translation.en: No, be careful! Don't… don't pick it up.
translation.zh: 不 小心！别抱它

translation.en: Don't pick… Okay. Well, just be… Okay. Take it outside.
translation.zh: 别…好吧 你抱了小心点 好 把它抱出去

translation.en: Okay, don't let… Be careful. Don't let it…
translation.zh: 好 别让…小心点 别让它…

translation.en: -That's really good. -What are these, Dad?
translation.zh: -很好-这是什么 爸爸？

translation.en: [Matt] Some, uh, biscuits.
translation.zh: 是饼干

translation.en: "From Barry the baker." Who's Barry the baker?
translation.zh: “来自烘焙师巴里”谁是烘焙师巴里？

translation.en: -I don't know. -I don't know.
translation.zh: -我不知道-我不知道

translation.en: I want this room!
translation.zh: 我要这个房间！

translation.en: I want it! I love it!
translation.zh: 我要！我喜欢！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 他们去哪了？我们走！

translation.en: -Whoa, this room is awesome! -I want this bed.
translation.zh: -这个房间太棒了！-我要这张床

translation.en: Where'd they go?
translation.zh: 他们去哪儿了？

translation.en: Guys, we can sort bedrooms later. First things first, let's find a kettle.
translation.zh: 各位 我们待会儿再分卧室首先 我们要找到水壶

translation.en: You have got to be kidding me!
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑？

translation.en: -[bleating] -Oh! Hello! [clears throat]
translation.zh: 哦！你好！

translation.en: Hello, Mr.… Mr. Goat.
translation.zh: 你好 山羊先生

translation.en: Kids, careful. Come round there.
translation.zh: 孩子们 小心 过来吧 站那里

translation.en: Hello. What… Right.
translation.zh: 你好 什么…好吧

translation.en: Okay, straight out there. Off you go. That's it. Go on.
translation.zh: 好吧 从那里出去 去吧 就这样 去吧

translation.en: Out the door!
translation.zh: 出去！

translation.en: The goat has gone.
translation.zh: 山羊出去了

translation.en: Rosie, would you look after everybody, and I will be back in a moment?
translation.zh: 萝茜 你能照顾下大家吗？我马上回来

translation.en: Water. Water.
translation.zh: 水

translation.en: Hang on!
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Hang… Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: -Hey! How goes it, farmer? [laughs] -[Matt] How goes it?
translation.zh: -喂！怎么样 农民？-怎么样？

translation.en: Not great, to be honest, Mo. I'm sat in a stream,
translation.zh: 说实话 不太好 莫我正坐在小溪里

translation.en: trying to get water for a cup of tea.
translation.zh: 就想打点水喝杯茶

translation.en: Yeah. Boo-hoo and all of that, yeah.
translation.zh: 好吧 真可怜

translation.en: Matty, I've got some news, right?
translation.zh: 马特 我有消息告诉你

translation.en: Banda House are pitching
translation.zh: 班达事务所也在争取

translation.en: for the Emblem account also.
translation.zh: 恩布勒姆的客户

translation.en: Banda House? Everything they pitch for, they end up winning!
translation.zh: 班达事务所？他们出手必赢

translation.en: That's why we really need you to nail this, Matty.
translation.zh: 所以我们才需要你搞定此事马特 好吗？

translation.en: For all of our sakes. None of us wanna lose our jobs before Christmas.
translation.zh: 为了我们所有人我们都不想在圣诞节前丢掉工作

translation.en: -We're really relying on you, bro. -What's that, Mo?
translation.zh: -我们真靠你了 兄弟-你说什么 莫？

translation.en: Yeah. Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Mo, I can't hear you.
translation.zh: 莫 我听不见

translation.en: Yo, he's smashing it, you know?
translation.zh: 他稳了

translation.en: I'm not worried at all!
translation.zh: 我一点都不担心！

translation.en: Okay, guys, let's take these upstairs.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 我们上楼去吧

translation.en: Be careful. We don't wanna set fire to the farmhouse tonight.
translation.zh: 小心点 可别把农舍烧了

translation.en: Maybe tomorrow if there's insurance.
translation.zh: 有保险的话 也许明天烧吧

translation.en: Are we really gonna spend Christmas on the farm, Dad?
translation.zh: 爸爸 我们真要在农场过圣诞节吗？

translation.en: -I like the moo-cows. -[chuckles] Yeah, I like the moo-cows too.
translation.zh: -我喜欢哞哞牛-我也喜欢哞哞牛

translation.en: Although we just call them…
translation.zh: 不过 记住 直接说…

translation.en: cows.
translation.zh: 牛就行

translation.en: [Matt] You looking for Mum?
translation.zh: 你在找妈妈吗？

translation.en: Do you think she likes it here, Dad?
translation.zh: 你觉得她喜欢这里吗 爸爸？

translation.en: Well, that depends.
translation.zh: 那要看情况

translation.en: Which one do you think she is?
translation.zh: 你觉得她是哪颗？

translation.en: That really twinkly one. See it?
translation.zh: 那个闪闪发光的 看到了吗？

translation.en: [Matt] Yes.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: That one's sparkling.
translation.zh: 那个很闪亮

translation.en: -Wow. That one's shining. -That one has to be Mum.
translation.zh: 哇 那个好亮 那个一定是妈妈

translation.en: -So beautiful. -Look at that shooting star over there.
translation.zh: -好漂亮-看 那边有流星

translation.en: -[kids] Whoa! -Everybody make a wish.
translation.zh: 好 大家许个愿

translation.en: And then back to bed.
translation.zh: 然后回床上去

translation.en: Whose wellies are they, Dad?
translation.zh: 这是谁的雨靴 爸爸？

translation.en: Well, I think they were my daddy's, but I'm not sure.
translation.zh: 可能是我爸的 但我不确定

translation.en: How come you don't know much about your dad?
translation.zh: 你怎么对你爸这么不了解？

translation.en: Because my daddy was very busy,
translation.zh: 因为我爸爸很忙

translation.en: and I didn't see him much at all when I was growing up,
translation.zh: 我小时候就没怎么见过他

translation.en: and then we lost contact.
translation.zh: 后来就断了联络

translation.en: I don't want to lose contact with you.
translation.zh: 我不想跟你失去联络

translation.en: That will never ever happen, okay?
translation.zh: 那是永远不会的 好吗？

translation.en: -Never. -[kids yell]
translation.zh: -永远不会-惊喜！

translation.en: [Matt] Oh, God! You've broke the bed!
translation.zh: 天啊！你们把床弄坏了！

translation.en: -[Matt] Kids, come in. Be careful. -Yay! The goat's back!
translation.zh: -孩子们 进来 小心点-山羊回来了！

translation.en: -[Lily] Yay! -Buster.
translation.zh: -好啊！-巴斯特

translation.en: What've we said about lollipops for breakfast, okay? Buster.
translation.zh: 我们不是说早餐不吃棒棒糖吗？巴斯特

translation.en: Hey! He took my lolly!
translation.zh: 喂！它抢走了我的棒棒糖！

translation.en: Ugh, Buster!
translation.zh: 巴斯特！

translation.en: It's not me!
translation.zh: 不是我！

translation.en: -It is not Buster, okay? The eggs are bad. -Maybe the chicken laid an egg.
translation.zh: 不是巴斯特 好吗？鸡蛋坏了 也许鸡下蛋了

translation.en: Let's go and see!
translation.zh: 我们去看看吧

translation.en: -And there is no Wi-Fi. There is no Wi-Fi! -Daddy, why are you shouting?
translation.zh: 还没有无线网络 -没有无线网络！-爸爸你在喊什么？

translation.en: Because there's no Wi-Fi!
translation.zh: 这里没有无线网络！

translation.en: -Any eggs? -We looked under every single chicken.
translation.zh: -有鸡蛋吗？-我们每只鸡都翻了

translation.en: No eggs. Nothing.
translation.zh: 没有蛋 什么都没有

translation.en: -Thought there were gonna be more animals. -Yeah, maybe even like a baby Fleece.
translation.zh: -我以为会有更多的动物-对 甚至有小羊毛毛

translation.en: -[Rosie] What was that? Come on! -[Violet] Let's go see!
translation.zh: 那是什么？来吧！ 来吧 我们去看看！

translation.en: Tiny pony!
translation.zh: 小马！

translation.en: -[Lily] Real-life donkey. -[Buster] And a baby cow.
translation.zh: 真驴子 还有一头小牛

translation.en: And a baby Fleece.
translation.zh: 还有小羊毛毛

translation.en: -Quick, hurry up, let's go. -[kid] Run!
translation.zh: 快点 我们走 快跑！

translation.en: It's an ogre.
translation.zh: 是食人魔

translation.en: Who said that? Come out and show yourselves.
translation.zh: 谁说的？出来 现身吧

translation.en: How did you get in?
translation.zh: 你们怎么进来的？

translation.en: Through the door.
translation.zh: 从门进来的

translation.en: Oh, very clever. [grunts]
translation.zh: 真聪明

translation.en: Oh, who are you?
translation.zh: 你们是谁？

translation.en: -Well, do you have names? -Everyone has names, don't they?
translation.zh: 你们有名字吗？ 人人都有名字 不是吗？

translation.en: Not necessarily, no. See that donkey?
translation.zh: 不一定 看到那头驴了吗？

translation.en: That's donkey number one, and that one is donkey number two.
translation.zh: 那是一号驴 那一头是二号驴

translation.en: -Why don't you name them? -Because I forgot to do it, okay?
translation.zh: 为什么不给它们取名？ 因为我忘了 好吗？

translation.en: What are your names?
translation.zh: 你们叫什么名字？

translation.en: I'm Violet.
translation.zh: 我是维奥莱特

translation.en: I'm Rosie, the oldest.
translation.zh: 我是萝茜 我是老大

translation.en: -I'm Buster. -And I'm Lily, Charlie's twin.
translation.zh: -我是巴斯特-我是莉莉 查理的双胞胎

translation.en: You don't look like twins.
translation.zh: 你们不像双胞胎

translation.en: [both] Because we're non-identical twins.
translation.zh: 因为我们是异卵双胞胎

translation.en: Right, okay, so what are you non-identicals doing on my farm?
translation.zh: 好吧 你们这对异卵双胞胎在我的农场做什么？

translation.en: -Our dad won it in a Willy Wonka thing. -What is a--
translation.zh: -我们爸爸中大奖赢下了农场-什么…

translation.en: He means a will. Dad got it from his father's will.
translation.zh: 他是说遗嘱爸爸是靠他父亲遗嘱得到的

translation.en: So you're the new owners?
translation.zh: 所以你们是新农场主？

translation.en: Oh my God! Well, why didn't you say? [laughs]
translation.zh: 我的天！你们怎么不早说？

translation.en: Hello! Uh, I am Beano.
translation.zh: 你们好！我是比诺

translation.en: Farmhand slash animal wrangler slash professional poo-picker-upper.
translation.zh: 农场工人兼牧马人兼职业挑粪工

translation.en: Hashtag Beano at your service.
translation.zh: #比诺为您服务

translation.en: Pleased to meet you, guys.
translation.zh: 幸会

translation.en: -Do you wanna meet the animals? -[kids] Yes!
translation.zh: -你们想见见动物吗？-想！

translation.en: [Beano] Yes, you do!
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: Then walk this way.
translation.zh: 那就这边走

translation.en: So this is my man pig, Arnie,
translation.zh: 这是我的公猪 阿尼

translation.en: named after his favorite actor, Arnold Schwarzenegger.
translation.zh: 以他最喜欢的演员阿诺德施瓦辛格命名的

translation.en: "I'll be back… bacon."
translation.zh: “我很快就回来…培根”

translation.en: No? Okay, and this beautiful, beautiful soul here is Potter.
translation.zh: 不懂吗？好吧 这个好伙计是波特

translation.en: Very, very magical. Trained at Hogwarts.
translation.zh: 非常神奇 在霍格沃茨学习过

translation.en: And meet these little legends. Itsy.
translation.zh: 还有这些小传奇 小小

translation.en: Bitsy. Bitsy. Yeah. Oh!
translation.zh: 小不点

translation.en: Teenie. Teenie.
translation.zh: 小豆丁

translation.en: And, oh, this one is Weenie, but be careful about Weenie,
translation.zh: 这位是小个子 对小个子要小心

translation.en: 'cause she will "wee wee wee-nie" all the way home.
translation.zh: 不然它吱吱咯咯就回家了

translation.en: Okay? Won't you, little one? Yes, you will.
translation.zh: 好吗？是吧 小家伙？对 没错

translation.en: See what I mean?
translation.zh: 明白我意思吗？

translation.en: -[Beano] Wanna meet Jingle? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你们想见叮当吗？-想

translation.en: -Ta-da! It's Jingle! -[kids] Aww!
translation.zh: 看！是叮当！

translation.en: Why has he got bells around his neck?
translation.zh: 它脖子上为什么挂着铃铛？

translation.en: So if he wanders off, we can hear him. He's only a baby sheep.
translation.zh: 如果它走丢了 我们就能听到它还是只小羊

translation.en: -[lamb bleats] -Hello, Jingle!
translation.zh: 你好 叮当！

translation.en: [all] Hello, Jingle!
translation.zh: 你好 叮当！

translation.en: That's amazing! Hello, pleased to meet you.
translation.zh: 太棒了！你好 认识你很高兴

translation.en: Hello, milady. Hello, sir.
translation.zh: 你好 女士 你好 先生

translation.en: Hello to you, and hello to you too.
translation.zh: 你好 还有你好

translation.en: You look after Jingle, okay?
translation.zh: 你照顾好叮当 好吗？

translation.en: Now, these two little ladies, Mary and Bright,
translation.zh: 这两位小姑娘 玛丽和布莱特

translation.en: they speak incredible French.
translation.zh: 它们说一口流利的法语

translation.en: -Ponies don't speak French. -[Beano] Excusez-moi!
translation.zh: -小马才不会说法语-不好意思！

translation.en: Mary. Oui. Bright?
translation.zh: 玛丽 是的 布莱特？

translation.en: Oui, oui! Au revoir.
translation.zh: 是的！再见

translation.en: Au revoir.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Oh, have you met Rudolph yet?
translation.zh: 你们见过鲁道夫吗？

translation.en: As in the reindeer?
translation.zh: 那只驯鹿吗？

translation.en: -Uh, no, as in Rudolph, the Great… -[dog barks]
translation.zh: 不 是鲁道夫 大…

translation.en: Oh! …Dane!
translation.zh: 丹犬

translation.en: Oh. See them sheep there?
translation.zh: 看到那些羊了吗？

translation.en: They belong to the farm, and Rudolph here is gonna herd them.
translation.zh: 它们是农场的 鲁道夫负责放羊

translation.en: So, is Rudolph a sheepdog, then?
translation.zh: 那鲁道夫是牧羊犬吗？

translation.en: Not really, no, but he's trying. Shall we give it a go?
translation.zh: 并不是 但它在努力胜任我们试试看吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Right.
translation.zh: -好-好

translation.en: Come on, Rudolph. Herd these sheep, boy! Come on, boy!
translation.zh: 来吧 鲁道夫 去放羊 去吧 小子！

translation.en: Go on, Rudolph!
translation.zh: 加油 鲁道夫！

translation.en: ♪ Out of all the reindeers ♪
translation.zh: 在所有的驯鹿中

translation.en: ♪ You know you're the mastermind… ♪
translation.zh: 你知道你是主心骨

translation.en: [Beano] Good boy.
translation.zh: 好孩子

translation.en: ♪ Run, run, Rudolph… ♪
translation.zh: 快跑 鲁道夫…

translation.en: [Beano] Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: ♪ Randolph ain't too far behind… ♪
translation.zh: 鲁道夫就在不远处…

translation.en: -[Beano] Come-bye! -[kids cheer]
translation.zh: 拜拜！

translation.en: ♪ Run, run… ♪
translation.zh: 快跑…

translation.en: Hi, kids. Where have you been?
translation.zh: 孩子们 你去哪里了？

translation.en: We've been talking to the animals with Beano.
translation.zh: 我们跟比诺一起聊动物来着

translation.en: That sounds great.
translation.zh: 听起来真棒

translation.en: Dad, can we go explore the farm some more?
translation.zh: 爸爸 我们可以再去探索农场吗？

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah, sure. Let me just try this. -Beano will look after us.
translation.zh: -好 当然 我先试试这个-没事 比诺会照顾我们

translation.en: Okay, no worries. I'll be there in five.
translation.zh: 好 没事 我五分钟后到

translation.en: Wait, what? Beano? Who's… who's Beano?
translation.zh: 等等 什么？ 比诺？比诺是谁？

translation.en: Right, that's… that's not gonna do it.
translation.zh: 好吧 这可不行

translation.en: [grunts] I'm coming, kids!
translation.zh: 我来了 孩子们！

translation.en: Okay. Right, okay. Get back! You get back, okay? Stay back, kids!
translation.zh: 好吧 退后！你退后别过来 孩子们！

translation.en: Who… who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: Please don't shoot.
translation.zh: 请不要开火

translation.en: He hasn't done anything wrong, Dad. He lives here.
translation.zh: 他没有做错什么 爸爸 他住在这里

translation.en: -What do you mean? -He lives here. He's the farmhand.
translation.zh: -什么意思？-他住在这里 他是农场工人

translation.en: And animal wangler.
translation.zh: 兼木人

translation.en: -No, it's actually wrangler. -Why have you even got that, Dad?
translation.zh: -不 其实是牧马人-爸爸 你怎么会有那个？

translation.en: Because I didn't know that Hagrid lived in the barn. Who are you?
translation.zh: 我又不知道海格住在谷仓里你是谁？

translation.en: Listen, I'm Beano. I live here. I've worked here my whole life.
translation.zh: 我是比诺 我住在这里我这辈子都在这里工作

translation.en: I've been telling your non-identicals about the farm.
translation.zh: 我刚刚在跟你的异卵双胞胎介绍动物和农场来着

translation.en: Dad, come and meet donkey number one. He's the cutest donkey in the world!
translation.zh: 对 爸爸 快来见一号驴它是世界上最可爱的驴子！

translation.en: Okay. Sorry. I just didn't…
translation.zh: 好 抱歉 我不…

translation.en: I'm sorry about… this. I don't think it works anyway.
translation.zh: 抱歉了 反正它大概也不好使

translation.en: [Buster] Dad, you scared Beano!
translation.zh: 爸爸 你吓到了比诺！

translation.en: -That was an accident. -[grunts] And you scared the animals.
translation.zh: 那是意外 你还吓到了动物

translation.en: Look at Mary! She's done a massive scared pony poo on the floor!
translation.zh: 看看玛丽！ 它吓得往地上拉了一大坨！向它道歉

translation.en: Say sorry to her.
translation.zh: 它吓得往地上拉了一大坨！向它道歉

translation.en: -Sorry, Mary. -In French.
translation.zh: -抱歉 玛丽-说法语

translation.en: -In? -French.
translation.zh: -什么？-法语

translation.en: [groans] Pardon, Mary. Il très, uh, nincompoop.
translation.zh: 不好意思 玛丽 他是白痴

translation.en: So, you work here?
translation.zh: 你在这里工作？

translation.en: -Oui. -Do you know anything about plumbing?
translation.zh: -对-你懂管道吗？

translation.en: Ta-da!
translation.zh: 看！

translation.en: -Wow, he's magic. -Now, this is just a temporary fix, okay?
translation.zh: 他会魔法 这只是暂时的办法 好吗？

translation.en: I have to take a proper look at your pipes.
translation.zh: 我得好好检查一下你的管道

translation.en: Okay, well, at least I can set up my workstation.
translation.zh: 好 至少我可以设置工作间了

translation.en: -Workstation? -[Matt] Yeah.
translation.zh: -工作间？-对

translation.en: That's why I'm here, to work on a big pitch.
translation.zh: 我就是为此而来 准备一个重要推介

translation.en: -No distractions. -What about your farm work?
translation.zh: -不能分心-那你的农场工作呢？

translation.en: -Isn't that what you do? -I am not the farmer. I am the farmhand.
translation.zh: -那不是你的事吗？-对 但我不是农民 我是农场工人

translation.en: The previous owner, your father, loved this place.
translation.zh: 之前的农场主 你父亲 他很喜欢这里

translation.en: -He was proper hands-on. -Was he?
translation.zh: -他非常亲力亲为-是吗？

translation.en: [Beano] He was a local hero.
translation.zh: 他是本地英雄

translation.en: He saved this place from the clutches of the bad people.
translation.zh: 他从坏人的魔掌中拯救了这个地方

translation.en: They were gonna knock it down.
translation.zh: 他们本打算拆了它 进行重建

translation.en: These bad people, did they offer any money or anything?
translation.zh: 这些坏人 他们给钱了吗？

translation.en: What? Proper cash-a-rooney.
translation.zh: 什么？大把的现金呢

translation.en: Yeah, but he loved the animals and farm way too much to ever sell it.
translation.zh: 但他太喜欢动物和农场了 不愿卖

translation.en: -He sounds awesome. -He was awesome.
translation.zh: -他听起来好棒-他是很棒

translation.en: You have to admit this place is past its sell-by date.
translation.zh: 你得承认 这地方已经过了保质期

translation.en: Nothing works. Even the hens don't work. Have you smelt the eggs? They stink!
translation.zh: 什么都不好用 母鸡都是你闻过鸡蛋了吗？是臭的！

translation.en: Yes, 'cause no one's been here. We've been waiting for you,
translation.zh: 对 因为一直没人来 我们一直在等你

translation.en: and now you are here, you can help us save the farm.
translation.zh: 现在你来了 你可以帮我们拯救农场

translation.en: [Matt] Get off me!
translation.zh: 放开我！

translation.en: Can we save the farm, Daddy?
translation.zh: 我们能拯救农场吗 爸爸？

translation.en: Yeah, Dad, can we save the farm with Beano?
translation.zh: 是啊 爸爸我们能和比诺一起拯救农场吗？

translation.en: No, staying here was just a temporary thing,
translation.zh: 不 待在这里只是暂时的

translation.en: and I'm gonna get on with some work.
translation.zh: 我需要去工作了

translation.en: We need to persuade your dad that this farm is way more important
translation.zh: 我们要说服你爸爸这间农场比他的推介

translation.en: than his silly little pitch. Who's with me?
translation.zh: 要重要得多 谁要一起来？

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
translation.zh: -好啊！-好！

translation.en: Okay. Walk this way.
translation.zh: 好 这边走

translation.en: Dad, you know Mummy would've wanted you to help us save the farm.
translation.zh: 爸爸 妈妈会希望你帮我们拯救农场

translation.en: You saw how twinkly she was last night.
translation.zh: 你看到她昨晚多闪亮了

translation.en: Okay, I tell you what, I will give you an hour tomorrow morning,
translation.zh: 好吧 这样吧明天早上 我给你们一小时

translation.en: and you can show me how this whole farm works.
translation.zh: 你们可以向我展示这个农场怎么运作

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: Well done, Mr. C.
translation.zh: 好样的 C先生

translation.en: [Beano] Hello!
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: Cock-a-doodle-doo! This is your 5 a.m. wake-up call.
translation.zh: 咯咯咯！这里是你的早5点叫醒服务

translation.en: Come on, sleepyhead.
translation.zh: 起来吧 瞌睡虫

translation.en: -5 a.m.? It's the middle of the night. -Excuse me! Cows don't wait.
translation.zh: -早5点？这才大半夜-不好意思！ 牛不等人

translation.en: They've got to be milked, ready or not, and you've got to pick up their poop.
translation.zh: 必须得挤奶了 不管你准没准备好你还得给它们挑粪

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Why have I got to do this job? It's awful.
translation.zh: 我为什么要干这个？好恶心

translation.en: Cows' poop are like golden nuggets. Fertilizes the grass, helps it grow.
translation.zh: 牛粪就像金块 可以给草施肥 帮助它生长

translation.en: We love the poop. We worship the poop.
translation.zh: 我们喜欢粪 我们崇拜粪

translation.en: How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
translation.zh: 吃葡萄不吐葡萄皮

translation.en: Hey, you remind me of someone. Have you seen the film The Shining?
translation.zh: 你让我想起一个人 你看过电影《闪灵》吗？

translation.en: Here's Beano!
translation.zh: 比诺来了！

translation.en: Let's chop some wood.
translation.zh: 我们去砍木头吧

translation.en: You need to put your back into it, Farmer Cunningham. Swing it really high.
translation.zh: 你得使点劲 坎宁翰农夫 挥得高点

translation.en: Yeah? Try…
translation.zh: 是吗？那…

translation.en: Whoa!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: -Pretend I'm a big voluptuous pig. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -假装我是只丰满的猪-嗯

translation.en: [Beano] Litter. Floor. Pig. Litter.
translation.zh: 垃圾 地面 猪 垃圾

translation.en: Ooh! Lollipop!
translation.zh: 哦！棒棒糖

translation.en: Dangerous. Put your litter in the bin.
translation.zh: 危险 垃圾要放进垃圾桶

translation.en: But most importantly, never ever leave that gate to the far field open,
translation.zh: 但最重要的是绝不能忘记关通往野地的门

translation.en: 'cause if that gate is left open, the animals will escape.
translation.zh: 因为如果门没关 动物会跑出去

translation.en: If they escape, they will get hurt, and if they get hurt, you will get hurt.
translation.zh: 如果它们跑出去 就会受伤 如果它们受伤 你也会受伤

translation.en: -Do you wanna meet the cows? -Yeah!
translation.zh: -你们想见见牛吗？-好！

translation.en: -Yes, you do! Come on. Let's go. -[Matt] Oh.
translation.zh: 当然了 来吧 走吧

translation.en: We've got Matilda, Patty, Harry, Hermione, Miss Trunchbull.
translation.zh: 这里有马蒂尔达 帕蒂 哈利 赫敏和特伦博小姐

translation.en: A cow called Miss Trunchbull?
translation.zh: 你有头叫特伦博小姐的牛？

translation.en: Oh, yes. Nanny McPhee and Susan Boyle.
translation.zh: 对 麦克菲保姆和苏珊博伊尔

translation.en: -[cow moos] -How many sheep do you have?
translation.zh: 你有多少只羊？

translation.en: Every time I count them, I fall to sleep, so I never get to the end.
translation.zh: 每次我数着数着就睡着了 所以我就没数完过

translation.en: -What do you get paid for doing all this? -All this?
translation.zh: -你做这些能拿多少钱？-这一切吗？

translation.en: I get to live in the barn for free and eat all the produce that we grow,
translation.zh: 我可以免费住在谷仓里还能吃我们种的农产品

translation.en: and I mean everything, and you give me money for sweets.
translation.zh: 什么都能吃 你再给我钱买糖

translation.en: Obviously, you have to pay for other things, like the vet.
translation.zh: 当然 你还得花别的钱 比如兽医

translation.en: -The vet? -[Beano] The vet.
translation.zh: -兽医？-对 兽医

translation.en: -Someone that looks after animals. -I know.
translation.zh: -就是照顾动物的人-我知道

translation.en: Why do you pay for a vet? It's a waste of money.
translation.zh: 为什么要付钱请兽医？这是浪费钱

translation.en: They're like dentists. Always add a bit extra. A rip-off.
translation.zh: 他们就像牙医 总想多收费就是骗钱的

translation.en: -Do you know him? Can you trust him? -I'm a "her" actually.
translation.zh: -你了解他吗？你信任他吗？-其实 我是个“她”

translation.en: And I don't rip anyone off.
translation.zh: 而且我不骗人

translation.en: -You're the horse lady. -And you're the road hog.
translation.zh: -你是骑马的女人-你是挡路的司机

translation.en: -I won't be staying long, don't worry. -[vet] That's a shame.
translation.zh: -我不会待太久 别担心-真可惜

translation.en: I baked these, but seeing as you're not staying…
translation.zh: 这是我烤的 但既然你不久留

translation.en: Give 'em to me!
translation.zh: 给我！

translation.en: Sorry, I just love Miss Ashley's cookies.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我好喜欢阿什利小姐的饼干

translation.en: -Chocolate chip? -Triple chocolate chip.
translation.zh: -有巧克力碎片吗？-三倍巧克力片

translation.en: Triple chocolate chip! Arnie! Look what Daddy's got for you.
translation.zh: 三倍巧克力片！阿尼！看爸爸给你拿了什么

translation.en: I take it you're acquainted with all the animals here, then?
translation.zh: 看来你跟动物都熟悉了？

translation.en: [Matt] I mean, I'm not really an animal person.
translation.zh: 是啊 我不是很喜欢动物

translation.en: Well, that's a shame. Mistletoe Farm has some wonderful livestock.
translation.zh: 真可惜 槲寄生农场有一些很棒的牲畜

translation.en: -And you're about to get a new addition. -Huh?
translation.zh: -而且还要添新丁了-什么？

translation.en: -Holly's about to pop. -What?
translation.zh: -霍莉要生了-什么？

translation.en: She's pregnant.
translation.zh: 它怀孕了

translation.en: You're kidding! [laughs]
translation.zh: 不会吧？

translation.en: You're kidding.
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑

translation.en: No, 'cause a kid is a baby goat. It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 不是 玩笑就是小山羊 算了

translation.en: You should prepare yourself because goats often have twins,
translation.zh: 你得准备好 因为山羊经常怀双胞胎

translation.en: sometimes triplets.
translation.zh: 甚至三胞胎

translation.en: -Triplets? -[piglet squeals]
translation.zh: 三胞胎？

translation.en: Oh, hello, Mr. Weenie! How are you today?
translation.zh: 你好 小个子先生 你今天怎么样？

translation.en: Hello, Ashley. Thank you for the cookies. I love you.
translation.zh: 你好 阿什利 谢谢你的饼干 我爱你

translation.en: -Oh, it's okay! -Wee, wee, wee.
translation.zh: 不 没关系

translation.en: -It's a present! -Okay. That's… weird.
translation.zh: -送你的！-好了 这好奇怪

translation.en: Listen, it was nice to meet you for a second time.
translation.zh: 听着 很高兴第二次见到你

translation.en: Hopefully I don't have to see you again. Oh, no. I just mean the animals are fine.
translation.zh: 希望我不必再见到你了 不 我是说 动物都没事

translation.en: I come and check up on them every week.
translation.zh: 我每周都会来看看

translation.en: And if Holly Goat's waters break, give me a call at the surgery.
translation.zh: 如果山羊霍莉的羊水破了打电话找我

translation.en: I think we've got it covered.
translation.zh: 我们应该能行

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Ooh. I think there's something brewing, Weenie.
translation.zh: 好像有事要发生 小个子

translation.en: -Dad, who was that? -That was the vet.
translation.zh: -爸爸 那是谁？-是兽医

translation.en: She's really pretty.
translation.zh: 她真漂亮

translation.en: She's really expensive is what she is, Rosie,
translation.zh: 她是很贵 萝茜

translation.en: and apparently we're having kids, maybe three.
translation.zh: 而且 我们还要有小山羊了可能还是三只

translation.en: But you've just met.
translation.zh: 但你们才认识

translation.en: No, not me and Miss Ashley. The Holly jolly goat.
translation.zh: 不是我和阿什利小姐 是霍莉羊

translation.en: Mr. Cunningham, I've give Weenie too many cookies.
translation.zh: 坎宁翰先生我给小个子喂了太多饼干

translation.en: There's poop everywhere. Take her. I need to clean it.
translation.zh: 它拉得到处都是 抱着它我得打扫一下

translation.en: Oh, I'm glad you're back.
translation.zh: 很高兴你回来了

translation.en: We've got a cat, two budgies, a parakeet, a ferret, a rabbit, and Oscar the pig.
translation.zh: 我们有一只猫 两只虎皮鹦鹉一只长尾小鹦鹉 一只雪貂 一只兔子 还要小猪奥斯卡

translation.en: Seems to have eaten something that he shouldn't have again.
translation.zh: 好像又吃了不该吃的东西

translation.en: -So, how did it go over at Mistletoe? -I met the new owner, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: 槲寄生那边情况怎么样？ 我见到了新农场主 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: -Ooh, what's he like? -To be honest, he's a bit…
translation.zh: -他什么样？-他有点…

translation.en: -Couldn't put it better myself. -[woman laughs]
translation.zh: 我也不能说得更贴切了

translation.en: What's Oscar been up to this time?
translation.zh: 奥斯卡这次又怎么了？

translation.en: He's eaten my dad's underpants again.
translation.zh: 他又吃了我爸的内裤

translation.en: -[Beano] Mr. Cunningham! -Oh God!
translation.zh: -坎宁翰先生-天啊！

translation.en: -You nearly gave me a heart attack! -Sorry.
translation.zh: -你差点吓得我心脏病发作！-抱歉

translation.en: Me and the kids have come up with a roster of farm chores,
translation.zh: 我和孩子们列出了需要做的农活儿

translation.en: and we put you in charge of Christmas!
translation.zh: 我们让你负责圣诞节！

translation.en: Yep. You've got to fix the barn up for the Hoedown Snowdown!
translation.zh: 对 你得修好谷仓 迎接瑞雪土风舞 -什么？-每年圣诞节都在谷仓举办

translation.en: -The what? -Happens every Christmas at the barn.
translation.zh: -什么？-每年圣诞节都在谷仓举办

translation.en: We snow the place down.
translation.zh: 我们把那里铺满雪

translation.en: There's mulled wine and barn dancing, cowboy.
translation.zh: 端上热红酒 在谷仓里跳舞 牛仔

translation.en: Wait, no. It will not be happening this year.
translation.zh: 等等 不 今年就不办了

translation.en: I need to do a pitch on Christmas Eve, and I need quiet.
translation.zh: 我平安夜还有个推介 我需要安静

translation.en: No, this will not do.
translation.zh: 这不行

translation.en: You have got to find a way to get Christmas into this barn.
translation.zh: 你得想办法让圣诞节气氛进入这个谷仓

translation.en: Your father would be very disappointed.
translation.zh: 你爸爸要是知道肯定会很失望

translation.en: Listen, you can have your Snowdown Hoedown if you like,
translation.zh: 好了 听着 如果你想就去办你的瑞雪土风舞

translation.en: but you're not gonna have it on my farm.
translation.zh: 但你别想在我的农场办

translation.en: Oh, boy, does your dad get angry.
translation.zh: 天啊 你们爸爸脾气好大

translation.en: I don't think he likes Christmas anymore.
translation.zh: 我觉得他不喜欢圣诞节了

translation.en: He even made me leave the Christmas tree at home.
translation.zh: 他还让我把圣诞树留在家里

translation.en: We need help, guys, and I know exactly who we need.
translation.zh: 我们需要帮助 我知道我们该找谁

translation.en: We need to get your dad into the village to meet the village people.
translation.zh: 我们得带你们爸爸去村里见村民

translation.en: -Yes! -Ooh.
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: This, guys, is Cobbledon.
translation.zh: 这里 就是柯布顿

translation.en: Post Office. Letters to Santa go there, okay, guys?
translation.zh: 邮局 给圣诞老人的信就从这里寄

translation.en: And now I'm gonna take ya to the Cobbledon Arms.
translation.zh: 现在 我带你们去柯布顿酒馆

translation.en: Come on, we're clearly not welcome here.
translation.zh: 走吧 这里显然不欢迎我们

translation.en: -What's all this? -It's for you!
translation.zh: -这是干什么？-是为你准备的！

translation.en: Beano told us you've come to save Mistletoe Farm.
translation.zh: 比诺说 你是来拯救槲寄生的

translation.en: You're our hero!
translation.zh: 你是我们的英雄！

translation.en: Come in, come in, let's meet everyone.
translation.zh: 来 跟大家认识认识

translation.en: This is Perky, the landlord.
translation.zh: 这是房东帕奇

translation.en: Pleasure to meet you, son of Cunningham. Hey, first one's on me.
translation.zh: 见到你很高兴 坎宁翰之子第一轮我请

translation.en: This is Ted the butcher, Barry the baker, and Merrick.
translation.zh: 这是屠夫泰德 烘焙师巴里 -还有梅里克-我猜猜 烛台制造师吗？

translation.en: Let me guess, the candlestick maker?
translation.zh: -还有梅里克-我猜猜 烛台制造师吗？

translation.en: -How'd you know? -I was joking.
translation.zh: -你怎么知道的？-我开玩笑的

translation.en: He does! He makes candles.
translation.zh: 的确！他是做蜡烛的

translation.en: I'm Otto, the builder.
translation.zh: 我是奥托 建筑工

translation.en: Anything you need fixing, I'm your man.
translation.zh: 你哪里需要修了 就找我

translation.en: And I'm Barney, the postman.
translation.zh: 我是巴尼 邮递员

translation.en: I delivered the inheritance. Told you you'd like it.
translation.zh: 是我把遗产送给你的我就说你会喜欢吧

translation.en: -And I'm the town crier! -Hello.
translation.zh: -我是街头公告员！-你好

translation.en: If you pop your head round here, you'll see Happy, Sneezy, Dopey,
translation.zh: 这边是开心果 喷嚏精 糊涂蛋

translation.en: and this bundle of joy, Grumpy.
translation.zh: 这个乐呵呵的是爱生气

translation.en: It's what they played in panto last year. They were typecast.
translation.zh: 他们去年在哑剧里演了这些角色老实说 就是本色出演

translation.en: My name's Gerald Favor. I'm the director of the Cobbledon Players.
translation.zh: 我叫杰拉德费弗我是柯布顿戏剧的导演

translation.en: Did I ever tell you all about that time I did The Mousetrap?
translation.zh: 我跟你们讲过我拍《捕鼠计》那次吗？

translation.en: [all] Yes!
translation.zh: 讲过！

translation.en: And one of my favorites, Miss Bow.
translation.zh: 还有我最喜欢的 鲍尔小姐

translation.en: Only because I own the sweet shop.
translation.zh: 只是因为我是甜品店老板

translation.en: Who are these little mites?
translation.zh: 这些小朋友是谁？

translation.en: We have Master Buster, Miss Violet, Miss Rosie, and the twins.
translation.zh: 这是巴斯特大人 维奥莱特小姐萝茜小姐 还有双胞胎

translation.en: They don't look like twins. -[both] They're non-identical. -Ah.
translation.zh: -他们看起来不像双胞胎-他们是异卵双胞胎

translation.en: -They're mine. -Where's your mummy?
translation.zh: -是我的-你们的妈妈呢？

translation.en: She died.
translation.zh: 她死了

translation.en: -Oh… -Uh, here, have some sweets.
translation.zh: 来 吃点糖

translation.en: And I knitted you some novelties. Perhaps you'd like to choose one each.
translation.zh: 我给你们织了点玩偶你们各选一个吧

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢-谢谢

translation.en: Hi, I'm Miss Nerris.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是内瑞斯老师

translation.en: Cobbledon Village School. Are these the children joining my class?
translation.zh: 柯布顿村学校的这些孩子要来我班上吗？

translation.en: I'm excited about getting them to hang out with children their age.
translation.zh: 是的 我很高兴能让他们和同龄的孩子一起玩

translation.en: There's only two children in my class.
translation.zh: 我班上只有两个孩子

translation.en: There's only two children in the whole school, actually.
translation.zh: 其实 全校只有两个孩子

translation.en: You see, we're a very small village with a teeny tiny population.
translation.zh: 我们是一座很小的村子 人口也少

translation.en: Forty-seven. Twenty-nine letterboxes.
translation.zh: 47人 29个信箱

translation.en: Fine, as long as they do educational activities.
translation.zh: 行 只要他们能接受教育就行

translation.en: Of course. -If I can think of any. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 当然 如果我能想到什么的话

translation.en: What I mean is education comes in many forms.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 教育有很多形式

translation.en: Does it?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -That is true.
translation.zh: -对-对 是的

translation.en: Do you like singing?
translation.zh: 你们喜欢唱歌吗？

translation.en: -Do you? -You're welcome to join the choir.
translation.zh: -是吗？-欢迎你们加入合唱团

translation.en: Hi, I'm Abel. I organize the welly throwing.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是亚伯 我负责组织丢靴子

translation.en: I'm Aaron, head bell ringer. We practice on a Monday if you're free.
translation.zh: 我是亚伦 负责撞钟如果你们有空 我们周一练习

translation.en: I'm Miss Verity. I run the village bookshop and library.
translation.zh: 我是瓦莱迪小姐我经营村里的书店和图书馆

translation.en: Pop in any time for a book and a biscuit.
translation.zh: 随时来看书 吃饼干

translation.en: By the way, my name's Miss Womble,
translation.zh: 对了 我是沃博小姐

translation.en: and I've created the knitting circle,
translation.zh: 我建立了编织俱乐部

translation.en: and I knit all the jumpers that you can see here,
translation.zh: 你们看到的毛衣都是我织的

translation.en: every single one of them, and the hats,
translation.zh: 每一件都是 帽子也是

translation.en: and we'd be delighted if you'd like to all join in,
translation.zh: 如果你们也愿意加入 我们会很高兴

translation.en: and we'd especially like you to join, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: 我们特别希望你能加入 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: If you don't know how to knit, we could knit you a jumper.
translation.zh: 如果你不会织我们可以给你织件毛衣

translation.en: We could knit your face onto it if you like.
translation.zh: 如果你想 我们还可以把你的脸织在上面

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得呢？

translation.en: -He's handsome, isn't he? -Yes.
translation.zh: -他还挺帅 是吧？-是啊

translation.en: Listen, I'm not really into all this community stuff.
translation.zh: 听着 我不喜欢这些社区活动

translation.en: We were gonna ask you to be the president of the Christmas Association.
translation.zh: 我们还想让你当 圣诞协会会长呢

translation.en: Your father always cut down the biggest Christmas tree
translation.zh: 你爸爸总会砍一棵最大的圣诞树

translation.en: and donated it to the village square.
translation.zh: 捐到村广场上

translation.en: We don't have a Christmas tree at the house.
translation.zh: 我们家都没有圣诞树

translation.en: -Not even any Christmas lights. -No Christmas on Mistletoe Farm?
translation.zh: 圣诞彩灯也没有 槲寄生农场不过圣诞节吗？

translation.en: Well, we'll have to see what we can do about that, won't we?
translation.zh: 那我们得想想办法了 是吧？

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Uh, who fancies a Cobbledon Soda? Yeah. You take a seat. Come on.
translation.zh: 谁想来杯柯布顿苏打水？ 你去坐吧 来

translation.en: -[Matt exhales] -How's Holly Goat?
translation.zh: 霍莉山羊怎么样了？

translation.en: Um, I haven't checked on her. I don't know.
translation.zh: 我没去看它呢 我不知道

translation.en: You haven't checked on your pregnant goat?
translation.zh: 你没去看过你怀孕的山羊吗？

translation.en: Well… No, I'm sure she'll be fine.
translation.zh: 它肯定没事的

translation.en: -I'll check when I get back. -[whimsical music plays]
translation.zh: 我回去后再去看
五千？这不可…

translation.en: 5,000, and he hasn't paid… Have you paid for anything?
translation.zh: 五千 他没付…你付过任何费用吗？

translation.en: Sweets. Sweets? £68 on sweets.
translation.zh: 糖 糖就68镑

translation.en: It can't be.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: Is it saying "Matt"?
translation.zh: 它是在喊“马特”吗？

translation.en: -Hey, Holly. How you doing? -[Holly bleats]
translation.zh: 霍莉 你好吗？

translation.en: Are you a bit anxious?
translation.zh: 你是不是有点焦虑？

translation.en: My wife was scared when she had our first baby.
translation.zh: 我妻子生我们第一个孩子时也很怕

translation.en: I mean, not as scared as me. I was terrified about being a dad.
translation.zh: 可没有我怕 我很害怕当爸爸

translation.en: Didn't know if I'd be any good.
translation.zh: 我不知道我能不能行

translation.en: Nice to see you talking to the animals, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: 很高兴你愿和动物说话 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: You know, they understand everything we say,
translation.zh: 我们说的话它们都懂

translation.en: and we can understand every bleat, moo, bark, oink, if we truly listen.
translation.zh: 如果我们用心聆听 也能理解它们的叫声

translation.en: Well, I have listened, understood, and now I'm leaving.
translation.zh: 我听了 我理解了 现在我要走了

translation.en: Mr. C, when you were talking to Holly about not being a good enough dad…
translation.zh: C先生 你跟霍莉说担心做不了好爸爸

translation.en: -I think you're going to be a great dad. -"Going to be"?
translation.zh: -我觉得你能成为爸爸-什么叫“能成为”？

translation.en: Me and your popsicle, we were close.
translation.zh: 我和你老爸 我们关系很好

translation.en: He let me call him grandpops because he knew he missed out
translation.zh: 他让我叫他爷爷 因为他知道

translation.en: on his own kid and grandkids.
translation.zh: 他没能陪伴他的孩子和孙子

translation.en: I don't want you missing out too.
translation.zh: 我不希望你也这样

translation.en: I am nothing like my "popsicle," okay?
translation.zh: 我跟我“老爸”一点也不像 好吗？

translation.en: I don't think you should be sticking your nose into my family.
translation.zh: 我觉得你也不该插手我家的事

translation.en: We're family too!
translation.zh: 我们也是家人

translation.en: How?
translation.zh: 怎么说？

translation.en: If your popsicle was my grandpops, then you are more or less my dad.
translation.zh: 如果你老爸是我爷爷那你差不多是我爸爸

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你说什么呢？

translation.en: You're a fully grown man, and you are definitely not my family.
translation.zh: 你是个大老爷们 更不是我的家人

translation.en: -Did you put that step there? -No.
translation.zh: -这是你放的吗？-不是

translation.en: -Night, Dad. -[sad music plays]
translation.zh: 晚安 爸爸

translation.en: You literally took the words right out of my mouth.
translation.zh: 你真是把我想说的话都说出来了

translation.en: Hey, Buster, what's up?
translation.zh: 巴斯特 怎么了？

translation.en: -I had a bad dream. -Oh, buddy, come here.
translation.zh: -我做了个噩梦-伙计 过来

translation.en: You know bad dreams aren't real.
translation.zh: 你知道恶梦不是真的

translation.en: Do we have to go to school tomorrow?
translation.zh: 我们明天非要去上学吗？

translation.en: School is meant to be fun.
translation.zh: 上学本该是有趣的

translation.en: But the children might laugh at me.
translation.zh: 但孩子们可能会嘲笑我

translation.en: -Why would anybody laugh at you? -Because I wear sparkly things.
translation.zh: -为什么会有人嘲笑你？-因为我穿闪亮的衣服

translation.en: You know, Buster, there's absolutely nothing wrong
translation.zh: 你知道吗 巴斯特 穿闪亮的衣服

translation.en: with wearing sparkly things. Anyone can wear sparkles.
translation.zh: 没什么不对 任何人都可以穿亮片

translation.en: Even Fleece?
translation.zh: 羊毛毛也是吗？

translation.en: Definitely Fleece.
translation.zh: 羊毛毛更是了

translation.en: Even Mary and Bright?
translation.zh: 玛丽和布莱特也是吗？

translation.en: Yes, ponies love sparkles.
translation.zh: 对 小马可喜欢亮片了

translation.en: Even you?
translation.zh: 你也是吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm not exactly a sparkly kind of person,
translation.zh: 我不是个穿亮片的人

translation.en: but your mum, she used to love anything with glitter and sequins.
translation.zh: 但你妈 她以前就喜欢亮片什么的

translation.en: Did she wear a princess crown?
translation.zh: 她还戴公主冠冕吗？

translation.en: I bet she did when she was your age.
translation.zh: 她像你这么大时肯定戴过

translation.en: -Shall we go to bed? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们去睡觉吧？-好

translation.en: Come on, then.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Mary and Bright fed and exercised?
translation.zh: 玛丽和布莱特吃饱 锻炼了？

translation.en: -Check! -Check.
translation.zh: -是的-好

translation.en: -Cows and goats milked? -[both] Check.
translation.zh: -奶牛和山羊挤奶了？-是的

translation.en: Pigs and piglets cleaned?
translation.zh: 猪和小猪都洗干净了？

translation.en: -Double check. -Double check-a-rooney.
translation.zh: -是的 是的-很好

translation.en: Next job, school.
translation.zh: 下一项 去学校

translation.en: We don't wanna go to school.
translation.zh: 我们不想去上学

translation.en: -We wanna stay on the farm with you. -I don't think your dad would like that.
translation.zh: -我们想和你待在农场-你们爸爸不会高兴的

translation.en: -How are we gonna get to school anyway? -Yeah, Dad always gives us a lift.
translation.zh: -我们要怎么去学校？-对 以前都是爸爸送我们

translation.en: Ta-da.
translation.zh: 看啊

translation.en: -[Buster] What are they? -Bicycles.
translation.zh: 那是什么？ 自行车

translation.en: -[Buster] I don't know how to ride. -You don't know how to ride a bike?
translation.zh: -我不会骑-你们不会骑自行车吗？

translation.en: Well, then, you're gonna have to learn. First bikes, then tractors.
translation.zh: 那你们得学了先是自行车 然后是拖拉机

translation.en: Get your right leg, put it over the bike.
translation.zh: 右腿跨过自行车

translation.en: Look forward, okay? No wobbling.
translation.zh: 往前看 不要摇晃

translation.en: These are your brakes.
translation.zh: 这是刹车

translation.en: Okay, guys? Very straight. Focus. Let's go.
translation.zh: 好吧 各位？直线向前 专心 走吧

translation.en: Second one, go.
translation.zh: 第二个 走

translation.en: Let's go, go, go! Yes, buddy.
translation.zh: 走吧 走！很好 伙计 脚踩脚踏板 对！

translation.en: Feet on the pedals. Yes! You've got it!
translation.zh: 走！很好 伙计 脚踩脚踏板 对！ 你们做到了！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: -Have you seen the kids? -They've gone to school.
translation.zh: -你看到孩子们了吗？-他们上学去了

translation.en: -What? How? -On their bikes. Like I did.
translation.zh: -什么？怎么去的？-像我当年一样 骑车

translation.en: You went to school?
translation.zh: 你上过学？

translation.en: Yeah. I went to farm school.
translation.zh: 对 我上了农场学校

translation.en: -Is that even a thing? -Uh, yes.
translation.zh: -还有那种东西？-是的

translation.en: Are you sure they're gonna be okay just biking off?
translation.zh: 你确定他们骑车没问题吗？

translation.en: -They don't know the area. -They'll be fine.
translation.zh: -他们又不熟悉这一带-他们会没事的

translation.en: -Where's the school? -In the village.
translation.zh: -学校在哪里？-在村子里

translation.en: -Where's the village? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -村子在哪里？-我不知道

translation.en: -[Buster] We're lost. -[Violet] It's okay, Buster.
translation.zh: -我们迷路了-我不想迷路 没事的 巴斯特

translation.en: [Charlie] I'm getting the wobbles again!
translation.zh: 我又打颤了！

translation.en: Dad says to always stay where we are until someone finds us.
translation.zh: 爸爸说要待在原地直到有人来找我们

translation.en: There's no one here though.
translation.zh: 但这里没有人

translation.en: Yes, there is. Look!
translation.zh: 有 看！

translation.en: [all] Yoo-hoo! Hello!
translation.zh: 你们好

translation.en: Hello, young 'uns.
translation.zh: 娃娃们好啊

translation.en: We're late for school.
translation.zh: 我们上学要迟到了

translation.en: The school's only up the road. Come on.
translation.zh: 学校就在前面 来吧

translation.en: Is there really no Christmas on Mistletoe Farm?
translation.zh: 槲寄生农场真的不过圣诞节吗？

translation.en: Nope, no Christmas.
translation.zh: 是啊 不过圣诞节

translation.en: We're gonna have to help your father bring back Christmas traditions.
translation.zh: 我们得帮你们父亲恢复圣诞节传统

translation.en: [Perky] And this is your new school.
translation.zh: 这就是你们的新学校

translation.en: There you are, children! Don't worry, I've only just got here.
translation.zh: 你们来了 孩子们 别担心 我也刚到

translation.en: Kayla and Kayan are dying to meet you.
translation.zh: 凯拉和卡扬很想见你们

translation.en: Pop your bikes on the floor. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 把自行车停在那边 谢谢你们

translation.en: -In you go. -Break a leg!
translation.zh: -进去吧-祝你们好运！

translation.en: Right, come on then. In you go. Sit down at the table.
translation.zh: 好 来吧 进去吧 坐下

translation.en: Right, then.
translation.zh: 那好了

translation.en: So now we have a big, huge class, we can do so many things.
translation.zh: 现在我们班有这么多人了我们可以做很多事

translation.en: We can… make a school choir or put on a big Christmas play.
translation.zh: 我们可以…组建校合唱团或排练一出圣诞舞台剧

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes!
translation.zh: -太好了！-太好了！

translation.en: What else do you wanna do?
translation.zh: 你们还想做什么？

translation.en: -We don't really like school. -Especially our old school.
translation.zh: 我们不喜欢上学 尤其是我们以前的学校

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: I had a lot of friends,
translation.zh: 我本来有很多朋友

translation.en: but when Mum died, I got sad, and they called me boring.
translation.zh: 但妈妈死后 我很难过他们说我无聊

translation.en: -Oh gosh, that's terrible, isn't it? -[Kayla and Kayan] Yeah.
translation.zh: 这太糟了 对吧？ -对-对

translation.en: -What about you, Violet? -I get scared.
translation.zh: -你呢 维奥莱特？-我会害怕

translation.en: Not about anything special. I just get the wobbles sometimes.
translation.zh: 也不是因为什么特定的事我就是有时会打颤

translation.en: That's all right. We all get the wobbles sometimes.
translation.zh: 没关系 我们都有打颤的时候

translation.en: Kids used to laugh at me because I wear sparkles.
translation.zh: 孩子们会笑我 因为我穿亮片

translation.en: We love sparkles here, don't we?
translation.zh: 我们可喜欢亮片了 是吧？

translation.en: -Yeah, they're pretty. -And they're cool.
translation.zh: -是啊 亮片很漂亮-而且很酷

translation.en: How about we decorate the school Christmas tree?
translation.zh: 我们去装饰学校圣诞树怎么样？

translation.en: -Yes! -[Miss Nerris] Make it sparkly.
translation.zh: -好啊-让它闪闪发亮

translation.en: Come on, then. Follow me.
translation.zh: 好吗？那来吧 跟我来

translation.en: That's it. Pop your decorations on.
translation.zh: 就这样 把你的装饰放上去

translation.en: -Where'd you get that star, Violet? -I made it for my mum at nursery.
translation.zh: -这星星是哪来的 维奥莱特？-我在托儿所给我妈做的

translation.en: We put it on the tree every year, but there's not a tree at the farmhouse.
translation.zh: 我们每年都把它放在树上但农舍里没有树

translation.en: Well, Miss Nerris, maybe we can lend them our tree this year. We don't mind.
translation.zh: 那内瑞斯老师 我们今年把我们的树借他们吧 我们不介意

translation.en: I don't think your dad would like it.
translation.zh: 你们爸爸恐怕不会高兴的

translation.en: I think our dad would be so busy working, he wouldn't even notice.
translation.zh: 我觉得爸爸会忙于工作根本不会注意到

translation.en: Really? Well, that's perfect.
translation.zh: 真的吗？太正好了

translation.en: We'll take the tree to the farmhouse, and he won't even know we've been.
translation.zh: 我们把树搬去农舍他都不会知道我们去过

translation.en: Global? Global, global. Global.
translation.zh: 全球

translation.en: -Marketing. Advantages. -[knocking on door]
translation.zh: 营销 优势

translation.en: Festive gifts and Womble's knits!
translation.zh: 节日礼物和沃博的编织物

translation.en: -It's Christmas! -Ho-ho-ho!
translation.zh: -圣诞节到了！-嚯嚯嚯！

translation.en: -Sorry, what? -Where would you like us to start?
translation.zh: 抱歉 什么？ -你要我们从哪开始？-什么？

translation.en: -[Matt] Start? -We've got to start on the decorations.
translation.zh: -你要我们从哪开始？-什么？ -我们得开始装饰了-好啊

translation.en: -Okay. -No, we'll dress the set.
translation.zh: -不-我们来装饰布景

translation.en: -Come on, Dame Judi. -See you later.
translation.zh: -来吧 朱迪夫人-回头见

translation.en: Oh, Merry Christmas, Mr. Cunningham!
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 坎宁翰先生！

translation.en: Okay, listen, everyone. Sorry, can I get your attention?
translation.zh: 大家听好了 抱歉 可以听我说吗？

translation.en: I really do appreciate the community spirit. I do, okay?
translation.zh: 我真的很欣赏这种社区精神真的 好吗？

translation.en: But is there not a time that is more convenient?
translation.zh: 但你能在更方便的时间再来吗？

translation.en: Christmas won't wait for convenience.
translation.zh: 圣诞节不会等到方便的时间

translation.en: The Hoedown Snowdown will not stage itself.
translation.zh: 瑞雪土风舞可不会自己安排

translation.en: We are not having the Hoedown Snowdown this year. Not here, not now.
translation.zh: 我们今年不办瑞雪土风舞了不能在这里 现在不行

translation.en: Okay? So if everyone can just…
translation.zh: 好吧？麻烦大家…

translation.en: Thank you so much. It's great, but if you can…
translation.zh: 谢谢 很好 但麻烦…

translation.en: That's it, take your hammer. Off you go. Very good. Thank you.
translation.zh: 没错 拿上锤子 走吧 很好 谢谢

translation.en: All the best. Thank you.
translation.zh: 祝福你们 谢谢

translation.en: They're only trying to bring Christmas spirit.
translation.zh: 他们只是想带来圣诞气氛

translation.en: I don't need Christmas spirit. I need peace and quiet.
translation.zh: 我不需要圣诞气氛我需要平静和安宁

translation.en: No. No. Out! Fine, no. Tell you what. Stay. Make yourself a sandwich.
translation.zh: 不 出去！ 好吧 那你留下吧 自己做个三明治

translation.en: Make yourself at home.
translation.zh: 留下来 别拘束

translation.en: -Get out of my way. -[donkey brays]
translation.zh: 让开

translation.en: Don't worry, donkey number two. He's just a silly old Grinch.
translation.zh: 别担心 二号驴他只是个傻乎乎的格林奇

translation.en: [laughs] I know. -Who wears a tie at a farm? -[knocking]
translation.zh: 我知道 谁在农场系领带？

translation.en: Ho-ho-ho. I've got a delivery for you.
translation.zh: 嚯嚯嚯 我有快递给你

translation.en: -What delivery? -Christmas cards from the villagers.
translation.zh: -什么快递？-村民的圣诞贺卡

translation.en: A lovely one from Miss Womble.
translation.zh: 沃博小姐的这件真不错手工编织的 令人赞叹

translation.en: Hand-knitted, impressive. Two lines of poetry in it.
translation.zh: 沃博小姐的这件真不错手工编织的 令人赞叹 还写了两行诗

translation.en: -Sorry, are you reading my post? -Only for health and safety.
translation.zh: -抱歉 你读了我的邮件吗？-只是为了健康和安全

translation.en: Shall I take yours to the sorting office now?
translation.zh: 要我把你的贺卡带去分拣室吗？

translation.en: It's Womble, L-E. Not E-L.
translation.zh: 是沃博 你拼错了

translation.en: You might wanna put a kiss on each card. We usually do, just to be friendly.
translation.zh: 你最好亲一下每张贺卡我们都这样 表示友好

translation.en: I'm not putting a kiss.
translation.zh: 我才不亲呢

translation.en: And talking of Christmas cards, your father used to be so popular,
translation.zh: 说到圣诞贺卡 你父亲以前很受欢迎

translation.en: he had hundreds of cards up here round on the walls.
translation.zh: 他墙上挂了几百张贺卡

translation.en: And generous!
translation.zh: 他还很慷慨！

translation.en: He used to put a £10 note in each card
translation.zh: 他以前会随每张贺卡附一张10镑钞票

translation.en: with a little note saying, "Have a Cobbledon Brew on me."
translation.zh: 还写上“请你喝杯柯布顿啤酒”

translation.en: Did he? Good for him. Right. That's the last one.
translation.zh: 是吗？他真好好了 那是最后一张了

translation.en: And you need to go.
translation.zh: 你得走了

translation.en: I have a very important virtual meeting with a friend of mine starting very soon.
translation.zh: 我马上要跟一位朋友开场非常重要的虚拟会议

translation.en: [Barney] All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We have real friends round here, Mr. Cunningham, not virtual ones.
translation.zh: 我们这里有真实的朋友 坎宁翰先生不是虚拟朋友

translation.en: Virtual friends, I don't know!
translation.zh: 虚拟朋友 什么啊！

translation.en: Ah, Miss Nerris, seeing as I'm passing, I'll just give you one of those.
translation.zh: 内瑞斯老师 既然正好路过我给你一个这个

translation.en: -Lovely. Thank you. -From…
translation.zh: -太棒了 谢谢-是…

translation.en: What's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: We brought it from the school!
translation.zh: 我们从学校拿来的！

translation.en: -Miss Nerris said we could! -Can we show Kayla and Kayan the animals?
translation.zh: 内瑞斯老师说 我们可以哄你开心！ 可以让凯拉和卡扬看看动物吗？

translation.en: -Haven't they got to get back to school? -No. Children love animals.
translation.zh: -他们不需要回学校吗？-不 没事 孩子喜欢动物

translation.en: Like I said, Mr. Cunningham, education takes many forms.
translation.zh: 我说过 坎宁翰先生 教育有很多形式

translation.en: [Beano] Mr. C! Mr. C!
translation.zh: C先生！

translation.en: Farmer Cunningham, it's Holly Goat. Her waters have broken!
translation.zh: 坎宁翰农夫 是霍莉山羊它的羊水破了！

translation.en: -What? -[Beano] Quick!
translation.zh: -什么？-快点！

translation.en: Okay, listen, I need you to call Miss Ashley, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 给阿什利小姐打电话 好吗？

translation.en: And… Oh, get a discount.
translation.zh: 还有…让她打折

translation.en: I'm coming!
translation.zh: 我来了

translation.en: Hang on!
translation.zh: 等等！

translation.en: Miss Ashley's on her way. Do you mind if me and the kids stay and watch?
translation.zh: 阿什利小姐这就来我和孩子们可以留下看吗？

translation.en: -This would be very educational. -Please can we see the baby goat get born?
translation.zh: -这会很有教育意义-对 拜托！ 我们可以看小山羊出生吗？

translation.en: Stay up there, okay? Stay out the way because this is grown-up stuff.
translation.zh: 去上面待着 别碍事因为这是成年人的事

translation.en: Blow out, blow in, blow out, blow in.
translation.zh: 吹气 呼气 吹气 呼气

translation.en: You don't blow out, blow in. You breathe in, you breathe out.
translation.zh: 不是吹气 是吸气 呼气

translation.en: Breathe in, breathe out. Breathe in, breathe out.
translation.zh: 吸气 呼气

translation.en: I can't breathe. I'm having a panic attack.
translation.zh: 我无法呼吸 我恐慌发作了

translation.en: You're hyperventilating. You need to calm down.
translation.zh: 你呼吸过度了 冷静下来

translation.en: No! Please! Come on, sheepy-sheep.
translation.zh: 不！拜托 快走 羊羊

translation.en: -That's it. I do have somewhere to go. -[bleating]
translation.zh: 就这样 我赶着去个地方呢

translation.en: -Yes! -That's… Oh, God! There's a head!
translation.zh: -对！-天啊！头出来了！

translation.en: There's a head in a bubble. I can't… I'm gonna…
translation.zh: 泡泡里有颗头 我不行 我…

translation.en: No, no. You are not gonna pass out!
translation.zh: 不 你不能昏过去！

translation.en: This is just Mother Nature taking its course.
translation.zh: 这只是自然的过程

translation.en: Look, I'll just take a… Oh my God. Yeah, that is a bit weird. I'm dizzy!
translation.zh: 让我来…天啊 这是挺奇怪 我头晕！

translation.en: Let me help.
translation.zh: 我来帮你

translation.en: Sh, it's all right. It's all right. You're doing really well. Keep pushing.
translation.zh: 没关系 你做得很好 继续用力

translation.en: Harder! Keep pushing! Harder! You're doing great! Harder! Keep pushing.
translation.zh: 用力点 继续用力！用力点 你做得很好 用力点 继续用力

translation.en: -Violet, you totally smashed it! -Look at what you did!
translation.zh: 维奥莱特 你做得好棒！ 看看你多了不起！

translation.en: Look what you did.
translation.zh: 看看你多了不起

translation.en: I got here as fast as I could. How's everything going?
translation.zh: 我尽快赶到了 一切都还好吗？

translation.en: -Well, you missed the whole thing. -I wouldn't be so sure.
translation.zh: -你全错过了-那可未必

translation.en: -She's right. I can see another bubble. -Beano, listen. I don't feel…
translation.zh: -她说得对 那儿还有一个泡泡-比诺 听着 我不太…

translation.en: What are you doing? This is no time to sleep.
translation.zh: 你干什么？现在不是睡觉的时候

translation.en: Violet will help you. She delivered the first one.
translation.zh: 维奥莱特可以帮你 阿什利小姐她给第一胎接了生

translation.en: -Well done, Violet. -[Violet] Come on, Holly.
translation.zh: -好样的 维奥莱特-来吧 霍莉

translation.en: [Miss Ashley] Ah! I'll just, uh, wrap her up in a towel.
translation.zh: -我给它用毛巾包上-好

translation.en: So cute.
translation.zh: 好可爱

translation.en: -Ooh. Oh! Looks like she's pushing again. -[phone rings]
translation.zh: 看来它又在用力了

translation.en: No, now is not a good time. I can't talk.
translation.zh: 不 现在不是时候 我没法说话

translation.en: Fletcher wants an update now!
translation.zh: 弗莱彻要你汇报进展 马上！

translation.en: I tried covering for you, but she wants to speak to you.
translation.zh: 我给你打掩护了但她坚持要找你谈！

translation.en: -Tell her I'm indisposed. -I tried, but she's insisting!
translation.zh: -告诉她我不舒服-我说了 但她还是坚持！

translation.en: Looks like a breech. I can find the feet. I need you to pull.
translation.zh: 似乎是臀位 我能找到脚 我需要你拉

translation.en: -What are you doing, anyway? -I'm trying to deliver a kid.
translation.zh: -你在做什么？-我在给山羊接生

translation.en: -What? -Oh God, Miss Fletcher's calling me.
translation.zh: -什么？-天啊 弗莱彻小姐打来了

translation.en: Cunningham! Is that you?
translation.zh: 坎宁翰！是你吗？

translation.en: Hi! Miss Fletcher.
translation.zh: 嗨！弗莱彻小姐

translation.en: It has come to my understanding
translation.zh: 据我所知

translation.en: that you're in some kind of creative retreat
translation.zh: 你在进行闭关创作

translation.en: so as to have no distractions, as it were. Is that right?
translation.zh: 以避免一切分心 是吗？

translation.en: That's right!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: -That's it! Push! I need you to pull. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 就这样！用力！你得拉

translation.en: -Is that a woman's voice I can hear? -No, it's just a kid.
translation.zh: -那是女人的声音吗？-不 只是山羊

translation.en: Come on, Holly. Push.
translation.zh: 来吧 霍莉 用力

translation.en: Children and business do not mix!
translation.zh: 孩子和生意不相称！

translation.en: Sorry, Miss Fletcher, you're breaking up. I have to go.
translation.zh: 抱歉 弗莱彻小姐 你信号不好我得挂了

translation.en: Come on, Holly! Push! I need you to push. Pull.
translation.zh: -加油 霍莉！用力！我需要你用力-你可以的 霍莉

translation.en: -That's it. -[Matt grunts, sighs]
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: -We did it! -[Miss Ashley] We did it!
translation.zh: -成功了！-成功了！

translation.en: Sorry. I didn't… It's just…
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不是…

translation.en: -Yeah. -We made a baby!
translation.zh: 我们生了个孩子

translation.en: We made a baby!
translation.zh: 我们生了个孩子！

translation.en: Ooh, big daddy!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: [chuckles] Look how many babies you've gone and done.
translation.zh: 看看你生了多少个孩子

translation.en: Who's a good daddy? You're a good daddy. Who's a good daddy?
translation.zh: 谁是个好爸爸？你是个好爸爸谁是个好爸爸？

translation.en: -[bleating] -[Miss Ashley] No, she's not taking.
translation.zh: 不 它不吃

translation.en: I'm afraid you're going to have to hand-rear them.
translation.zh: 恐怕 你得亲手喂了

translation.en: Take them in for a while.
translation.zh: 暂且照顾它们一阵

translation.en: Miss Holly's exhausted.
translation.zh: 霍莉小姐累坏了

translation.en: Don't worry, they'll be okay.
translation.zh: 别担心 它们会没事的

translation.en: If you can bottle-feed them, take them to bed, cuddle them,
translation.zh: 用奶瓶喂它们 把它们抱到床上抱抱它们

translation.en: keep them warm, sing to them, things you did with your own children.
translation.zh: 让它们保暖 给它们唱歌就像对你自己的孩子那样

translation.en: I didn't really do the nursing stuff.
translation.zh: 我并没照顾过孩子

translation.en: Well, now's your chance.
translation.zh: 现在机会来了

translation.en: -[goat bleats] -Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: So you did really well, Miss Violet.
translation.zh: 你表现得很好 维奥莱特小姐

translation.en: Would you like to come and help me at the surgery?
translation.zh: 想来诊所给我做帮手吗？

translation.en: -[gasps] Yes, please. Can I, Dad? -I don't see why not.
translation.zh: -好啊 可以吗 爸爸？-没什么不可以

translation.en: I know he wants them to be in school, but seeing little Violet there in action
translation.zh: 我知道他希望他们上学但刚刚看小维奥莱特的举动

translation.en: makes me think farm school would be better for their confidence.
translation.zh: 让我觉得农场学校更能培养他们的自信

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Miss Nerris. That's what I've been trying to tell people.
translation.zh: 谢谢 内瑞斯老师我一直跟大家这么说

translation.en: Farm school is amazing,
translation.zh: 农场学校很棒

translation.en: and Farmer Cunningham needs it more than anyone.
translation.zh: 坎宁翰农夫比任何人都需要去学学

translation.en: And the kids, too, especially Kayla and Kayan.
translation.zh: 孩子们也是 尤其是凯拉和卡扬

translation.en: They've been on their own up until now.
translation.zh: 他们之前一直只有自己

translation.en: Don't worry, Miss Nerris. Beano's got a plan.
translation.zh: 别担心 内瑞斯老师 比诺有个计划

translation.en: We've got three baby Christmas goats.
translation.zh: 我们有三只圣诞小山羊 对吧？

translation.en: So what about… Snowy?
translation.zh: 所以叫…白雪？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah? Star.
translation.zh: -好-好吗？星星

translation.en: -Yeah! -Do you want to name the third?
translation.zh: -好！-你们想给第三只起名吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -[Beano] Go on, then!
translation.zh: -想-那去吧！去想个名字

translation.en: We want to name it after our mummy.
translation.zh: 我们想用妈妈的名字来命名

translation.en: This little dude's a boy.
translation.zh: 这小家伙是个公的

translation.en: We don't mind. We want to call it Sarah.
translation.zh: 我们不介意 我们要叫它莎拉

translation.en: Welcome, Sarah,
translation.zh: 欢迎 莎拉

translation.en: to the family.
translation.zh: 欢迎加入我们家庭

translation.en: -Hello? -[Mo] Yo, she's after your address.
translation.zh: -喂？-她在找你的地址

translation.en: -She wants to know where the farm is! -What?
translation.zh: -她想知道农场在哪里！-什么？

translation.en: [Mo] Fletcher! She said she was disappointed with your FaceTime call,
translation.zh: 弗莱彻！她说她对你的网络通话感到失望

translation.en: said you were distracted by your kids!
translation.zh: 说你完全被孩子干扰了！

translation.en: Well, to be honest, it wasn't my kids. It was Holly's.
translation.zh: 其实不是我的孩子 是霍莉的

translation.en: [Mo] You were supposed to go to that farm to work, to save our jobs.
translation.zh: 你是去那个农场工作的 马特拯救我们的工作

translation.en: The Banda House vultures are circling this deal, bro!
translation.zh: 班达事务所 他们盯着这笔交易呢！

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -Somebody at the door.
translation.zh: 有人来了

translation.en: Hi, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: 嗨 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: Just thought that it'd be really nice
translation.zh: 我只是觉得如果能让孩子们

translation.en: if the children could spend time with the baby goats?
translation.zh: 跟小山羊一起玩玩会很棒

translation.en: -[bleating] -Uh, what, today?
translation.zh: 今天吗？

translation.en: Me and the villagers thought it'd be really great
translation.zh: 我和村民们讨论过

translation.en: if everyone could take part in their education,
translation.zh: 我们认为大家都应该参与到他们的教育中来

translation.en: and today is your turn.
translation.zh: 今天轮到你了

translation.en: I've already got five children, three kids.
translation.zh: 我已经有五个孩子 三只羊了

translation.en: You want to give me two more?
translation.zh: 你还要再给我两个吗？

translation.en: "It'd be so good for them to have children their own age to play with."
translation.zh: “能让他们和同龄的孩子一起玩就太好了”

translation.en: -Isn't that what you said? -Yes. But I didn't mean--
translation.zh: -你不是这么说的吗？-对 但我不是说…

translation.en: Okay, off you pop. Have fun!
translation.zh: 好了 去吧 玩得开心！

translation.en: -Enjoy farm school! -Right, who wants to dig up some sprouts?
translation.zh: -在农场学校开心点！-再见 好了 谁想挖芽菜？

translation.en: Yes, come on. Follow me!
translation.zh: 好 来 跟我来！

translation.en: Last one to the top of the hill has to peel them too!
translation.zh: 最后到山顶的人还要负责削皮

translation.en: You too, Mr. Cunningham!
translation.zh: 你也是 坎宁翰先生！

translation.en: Come on, Rudolph!
translation.zh: 来吧 鲁道夫！

translation.en: Come on, boy.
translation.zh: 来吧 小子

translation.en: -What's going on? -We're having sprouts for lunch.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？-我们午餐吃芽菜

translation.en: [laughs] Good luck getting my kids to have sprou-- [Buster] Mm.
translation.zh: 你能让我的孩子吃芽菜才怪了

translation.en: Buster, where's your lollipop?
translation.zh: 巴斯特 你的棒棒糖呢？

translation.en: I gave it to Billy Goat. I like sprouts now.
translation.zh: 给比利山羊了 我现在喜欢芽菜了

translation.en: -Do you want a sprout? -No. Absolutely not.
translation.zh: -你要来点吗？-不 绝对不要

translation.en: You can't hide in your study forever!
translation.zh: 你不能永远藏在书房里

translation.en: So we need to find a way to draw him out of that boring little study.
translation.zh: 我们得想办法把他从那间无聊的书房里引出来

translation.en: -Any ideas? -Why don't you show Dad your tractor?
translation.zh: -有什么想法？-你怎么不带爸爸看拖拉机？

translation.en: Oh yeah! Even Daddy likes tractors.
translation.zh: 对！爸爸也喜欢拖拉机

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I love it.
translation.zh: 对 好主意

translation.en: It's big. It's bold. It's beautiful!
translation.zh: 大动作 大胆 太棒了

translation.en: Come on, follow me.
translation.zh: 来吧 跟我来

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们走！

translation.en: -Ready? Let's go! Woo-hoo! -[exciting music plays]
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？我们走！

translation.en: Innovation that we can bring to your products and your businesses.
translation.zh: 我们可以为您的产品和生意带来创新

translation.en: -We go the extra mile. -[bleep]
translation.zh: 我们更进一步

translation.en: -Why is it doing that? The-- -[beeping]
translation.zh: 这怎么回事？ 这是怎么了？

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 这是怎么了？

translation.en: It's crashed. Oh my God. Yeah, I know. It's worse than that. Okay.
translation.zh: 宕机了 我的天啊 我知道 还有更糟的 好吧

translation.en: What else did I write? I wrote "connections."
translation.zh: 我还写了什么？我写了“人脉”

translation.en: Oh, this is a nightmare!
translation.zh: 这真是噩梦

translation.en: What's that growing on the tree, Beano?
translation.zh: 树上长的是什么 比诺？

translation.en: Oh, this?
translation.zh: 这个吗？

translation.en: This is mistletoe. It grows all over the farm.
translation.zh: 这是槲寄生 全农场到处都是
