translation.en: That's where Mistletoe Farm gets its name. But our mistletoe is magic.
translation.zh: 所以农场才叫槲寄生农场 但我们的槲寄生有魔法

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: Our mistletoe doesn't make people just kiss.
translation.zh: 我们的槲寄生不仅让人接吻

translation.en: It makes them fall in love.
translation.zh: 还让他们坠入爱河

translation.en: Come on! I'll show ya.
translation.zh: 来吧！我给你们看

translation.en: Donkey number one, donkey number two, I've seen the way you look at each other.
translation.zh: 驴一号 驴二号我看到你们看彼此的眼神了

translation.en: Now it's time to bring some magic to your romance.
translation.zh: 现在该给你们的爱情注入一些魔法了

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: [chuckles] Love is in the air!
translation.zh: 空气中有爱！

translation.en: That's what I'm saying. It's an absolute nightmare.
translation.zh: 对！ 我就是这个意思真是一场噩梦

translation.en: My computer's crashed. He's left me all these unpaid bills.
translation.zh: 我的电脑宕机了他给我留了一堆没付的账单

translation.en: -Hay bills, electricity, gas, water! -I knew this would happen.
translation.zh: -干草费 电费 煤气费 水费-我就知道会这样

translation.en: Your father's left you in trouble.
translation.zh: 你父亲给你留了一堆麻烦

translation.en: I know that you said to manage my expectations.
translation.zh: 不 我知道你说别抱太高期望

translation.en: We're coming back to London straight away.
translation.zh: 我们马上就回伦敦

translation.en: Sorry, Mum, can I call you back?
translation.zh: 抱歉 妈妈 我再打给你 好吗？

translation.en: -Do you want to ride the tractor? -No! I've got tons of work to do!
translation.zh: -你想开拖拉机吗？-不！我还有很多工作要做！

translation.en: -I don't wanna go back to London. -We have to do something.
translation.zh: -我不想回伦敦-我们得做点什么

translation.en: Magic mistletoe. Voilà.
translation.zh: 魔法槲寄生 看啊

translation.en: Merry Christmas to you.
translation.zh: 祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -How's it going?
translation.zh: -圣诞快乐-怎么样？

translation.en: We're trying to help with the bills so he doesn't take them back to London.
translation.zh: 我们在帮坎宁翰农夫处理账单这样他就不会带他们回伦敦了

translation.en: No way! You can't go back there! This is your home now.
translation.zh: 不行！你们不能回去这里是你们的家了

translation.en: -What's going on? -Their dad wants to take 'em to London.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？-他们的爸爸想带他们回伦敦

translation.en: But you're the future of Cobbledon. All right, let me get one.
translation.zh: 但你们是柯布顿的未来好吧 我来买一束

translation.en: Hello, children. I've brought you each a ball of wool and some needles.
translation.zh: 你们好 孩子们 来 我给你们都带来了毛球和针

translation.en: You can choose your color. Ooh! The mistletoe.
translation.zh: 你自己选颜色吧 哦！槲寄生啊

translation.en: I haven't seen this for a while. I'm gonna have a whole basketful.
translation.zh: 我好久没看到这个了我要买一篮子

translation.en: -Oh! -[Miss Womble] Thank you.
translation.zh: -好！-谢谢

translation.en: -Never know when the magic will happen! -No!
translation.zh: 谁知道魔法何时会降临 沃博小姐 是啊！

translation.en: Hello, Otto.
translation.zh: 你好 奥托

translation.en: Hey, you want some? It's for a good cause.
translation.zh: 来点吗？是为了好事由

translation.en: Why would I want some? It's not like I want to kiss Miss Nerris.
translation.zh: 我要它做什么？我又不想亲内瑞斯老师

translation.en: I've made a contribution.
translation.zh: 我做出了贡献

translation.en: I'll keep it safe… until you're ready.
translation.zh: 我会妥善保管 直到你准备好了

translation.en: I've been ready for years, Otto.
translation.zh: 我已经准备好很多年了 奥托

translation.en: Beano, can I get some of that?
translation.zh: 比诺 能给我来点槲寄生吗？

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: Hello, ladies! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你们好 女士们！

translation.en: Hello!
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: [gasps] How are the kids?
translation.zh: 小羊们怎么样了？

translation.en: Mr. Cunningham's doing really well with them.
translation.zh: 坎宁翰先生很会照顾它们

translation.en: He's even named one of them Sarah.
translation.zh: 他甚至给一只起名叫莎拉

translation.en: I'll take one of those. You never know when you might need it.
translation.zh: 给我一束 谁知道什么时候会需要

translation.en: -[Beano] Yeah. -[whimsical music plays]
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: It's gonna happen! It's gonna happen!
translation.zh: 一定能成！

translation.en: Sorry to disturb you.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰了

translation.en: I hear you're thinking about going back to the city.
translation.zh: 听说你在考虑回城

translation.en: -Where'd you hear that? -The village vine.
translation.zh: -你在哪听说的？-村子消息网

translation.en: -Can you take Snowy? -Sure.
translation.zh: -你能抱下白雪吗？-当然

translation.en: -Come on. -I just need to go boil the kettle.
translation.zh: -来吧-我去烧水

translation.en: Get the hot water bottles ready. Come on.
translation.zh: 准备好热水袋 来吧

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 小家伙们

translation.en: I'm gonna keep you nice and warm.
translation.zh: 让你们暖和点

translation.en: -[bleating] -[Miss Ashley] Good girl.
translation.zh: 真乖

translation.en: How are you girls getting on?
translation.zh: 你们怎么样了？

translation.en: -New owner treating you well? Huh? -[donkeys bray]
translation.zh: 新农场主对你们好吗？

translation.en: -[Matt] You're great with the animals. -Thank you. Just did Holly's milk.
translation.zh: -你真的很会跟动物相处-谢谢你 -刚给霍莉挤了奶-谢谢

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: -刚给霍莉挤了奶-谢谢

translation.en: It's easier with Holly's kids than my own.
translation.zh: 带霍莉的孩子比带我的孩子轻松多了

translation.en: Must be hard for them losing their mum.
translation.zh: 失去妈妈 他们肯定很难过

translation.en: I don't really like to talk about it.
translation.zh: 我不想谈这件事

translation.en: Well, if you ever do want to talk about it,
translation.zh: 如果你想谈

translation.en: I'm good with humans too.
translation.zh: 我也很会跟人相处

translation.en: -[cell phone rings] -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 对了

translation.en: Emergency. It's, uh, Oscar the pig again.
translation.zh: 紧急情况 又是小猪奥斯卡

translation.en: -Gotta go! -No, wait.
translation.zh: -我得走了-不 等等

translation.en: You dropped something.
translation.zh: 你掉了东西

translation.en: Do you think she used the mistletoe?
translation.zh: 你觉得她用槲寄生了吗？

translation.en: Doesn't look like it. But if your dad and Miss Ashley did fall in love,
translation.zh: 看起来没有 但如果你们爸爸和阿什利小姐相爱了

translation.en: he would definitely want to stay and save the farm.
translation.zh: 他肯定会想留在这里 拯救农场

translation.en: -We need to make it happen. -[Charlie] What about Mum?
translation.zh: 我们得让这成真 那妈妈呢？

translation.en: [Rosie] I think she wants that too.
translation.zh: 我觉得她也会希望这样

translation.en: We need to find a way to get Miss Ashley back here.
translation.zh: 我们得想办法让阿什利小姐回来

translation.en: Why don't we ask her for dinner tomorrow?
translation.zh: 我们明天约她来吃饭吧？

translation.en: And pretend that Rudolph's sick and needs help?
translation.zh: 假装鲁道夫病了 需要帮助？

translation.en: Won't she be mad if she finds out we're lying?
translation.zh: 如果她发现我们撒谎不会生气吗？

translation.en: No, no. She won't find out.
translation.zh: 不 她不会发现的

translation.en: Rudolph is a really good actor. He is well sick.
translation.zh: 鲁道夫很会演戏 他病得很重

translation.en: Right, for this smoochy magic to work, we're gonna need way more mistletoe, okay?
translation.zh: 好了 为了让这个魔法成功我们需要更多槲寄生 好吗？

translation.en: Let's spread out all over the farm.
translation.zh: 我们去农场各处

translation.en: Operation Mistletoe, go, go, go! Let's go!
translation.zh: 槲寄生行动 开始 我们走！

translation.en: I have had no updates
translation.zh: 我没听到任何进展

translation.en: and no evidence to suggest he has done any work at all.
translation.zh: 也没有任何证据 证明他真做了什么

translation.en: If Fletcher Consultants is in trouble,
translation.zh: 如果弗莱彻咨询公司真有麻烦了

translation.en: I need to see it with my own eyes.
translation.zh: 我需要亲眼看到

translation.en: No, she can't come here.
translation.zh: 不 她不能来这里

translation.en: That's what she said! She's the boss!
translation.zh: 她就是这么说的！她可是老板

translation.en: I think she thinks you're hiding.
translation.zh: 我觉得她以为你躲起来了

translation.en: Just stop her from coming, okay? I am so close to nailing this pitch.
translation.zh: 阻止她过来 好吗？我快要搞定推介了

translation.en: You look worried. Why am I talking to a goat? I need to get out!
translation.zh: 你担心吗？你似乎很担心我为什么要跟山羊说话？我得出去！

translation.en: Brilliant job! Yes! Let's go, go, go!
translation.zh: 太棒了！好！我们走！

translation.en: -Peekaboo! -Hello there. [laughs awkwardly]
translation.zh: -躲猫猫！-你好

translation.en: I understand you're having a bit of financial difficulty at the farm.
translation.zh: 我得知 槲寄生农场有财务困难

translation.en: Now look, we've got a Christmas show coming up.
translation.zh: 圣诞表演马上要举办了

translation.en: I would be more than happy to do a bucket collection.
translation.zh: 我很乐意进行铁桶筹款

translation.en: I really need a singer for the carol concert.
translation.zh: 我需要一位歌手加入圣诞颂歌演唱

translation.en: Maybe a little singsong will cheer you up.
translation.zh: 也许唱唱歌 能让你开心一点

translation.en: No, I don't sing.
translation.zh: 不 我不唱歌

translation.en: Lily's coming to the library later. You could read with her.
translation.zh: 莉莉待会要去图书馆也许你可以跟她一起读点什么

translation.en: Pop into the bakery. Violet's coming in to help with the Christmas cakes.
translation.zh: 去趟面包店吧 维奥莱特要来帮忙做圣诞蛋糕

translation.en: No, I'm trying to lose calories, not gain them.
translation.zh: 不 我还想减重呢 不是增重

translation.en: We don't count calories in Cobbledon!
translation.zh: 柯布顿才不管热量呢 坎宁翰先生！

translation.en: Tie it up all over the house,
translation.zh: 把它挂满整栋屋子

translation.en: so when they walk under it, they have to kiss,
translation.zh: 他们一旦走在它下面 就必须接吻

translation.en: and then, boom, magic!
translation.zh: 那就是魔法时刻！

translation.en: I've been meaning to ask about the Christmas tree. You won't let us down!
translation.zh: 坎宁翰 我一直想问你圣诞树的事我知道你不会让我们失望的！

translation.en: [laughs] Mr. Cunningham, we've got a quote here for a new roof on the barn.
translation.zh: 坎宁翰先生这是份给谷仓修屋顶的报价单

translation.en: It's in a terrible state, leaking for years.
translation.zh: 它的状态很糟 漏雨很多年了

translation.en: It's a bit expensive, but maybe we can all help out.
translation.zh: 有点贵 但也许我们都可以帮忙

translation.en: I'm not a charity.
translation.zh: -我又不是做慈善的-但你是家人

translation.en: -But you're family. Cobbledon family. -You're one of the village people now.
translation.zh: -我又不是做慈善的-但你是家人 -柯布顿大家庭的-你现在是村里的人了

translation.en: Always great to see you, and I'll see you soon.
translation.zh: 见到你们总是很高兴 回头见了

translation.en: -At the Christmas fair! -Christmas fair.
translation.zh: -圣诞集市上见！-圣诞集市上见

translation.en: -[Miss Womble] That's where we'll see you. -[Miss Verity] See you.
translation.zh: -我们到时再见-好 -再见 坎宁翰先生-圣诞集市见 坎宁翰先生！

translation.en: -[Barney] At the Christmas fair! -Okay!
translation.zh: -再见 坎宁翰先生-圣诞集市见 坎宁翰先生！ -好-别错过！

translation.en: -[man] Don't miss it! -[woman] Missing you already!
translation.zh: -好-别错过！ 这就想你了！

translation.en: -Where's my speech? -[Beano] What speech?
translation.zh: -我的讲稿呢？-什么讲稿？

translation.en: The thing I've been writing on paper!
translation.zh: 讲稿 推介 我写在纸上的东西

translation.en: -You mean that one? -[Matt] No, no, no! Give me that.
translation.zh: -那个吗？-不 给我

translation.en: Have you not got a backup on your computer?
translation.zh: 你的电脑没有备份吗？

translation.en: Computer's broken. That's why I wrote it on paper.
translation.zh: 电脑坏了 所以我才写在纸上

translation.en: Okay. Now I've had another little fiddle with the pipes,
translation.zh: 好吧 我又修了修你的水管

translation.en: but I think you're gonna need a proper plumber.
translation.zh: 但你恐怕得请正经水管工了

translation.en: It's freezing!
translation.zh: 好冷！

translation.en: Mistletoe Farm. I've got a bit of an emergency.
translation.zh: 槲寄生农场 我们有紧急情况

translation.en: Broken water pipe. Yeah, quick as you can. Okay, thank you.
translation.zh: 水管坏了 对 尽快来 好 谢谢

translation.en: "Rural Estates. Property Buyers. Cash Offers."
translation.zh: “乡村地产 购买房地产 使用现金”

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Sorry, I haven't got time. I'm waiting for a plumber.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我现在没时间做这个 -我在等水管工-我就是水管工

translation.en: -I am the plumber. -[Matt] You're the baker!
translation.zh: -我在等水管工-我就是水管工 -你不是烘焙师吗！-也是水管工

translation.en: -And plumber. -Come in. Thank you.
translation.zh: -你不是烘焙师吗！-也是水管工 进来 谢谢

translation.en: We're so grateful you came to rescue the farm,
translation.zh: 我们很感激你来营救农场

translation.en: save it from those nasty developers who were sniffing around.
translation.zh: 不让它落入那些到处钻营的地产开发商之手

translation.en: Oh, rotten, they were.
translation.zh: 他们坏透了

translation.en: Relentless, yeah. They only care about money, money, money.
translation.zh: 不管不顾 他们只在乎钱

translation.en: They sound terrible.
translation.zh: 他们真可怕

translation.en: They don't care if those animals are carted off to you know where.
translation.zh: 他们根本不在乎动物们会被送去哪

translation.en: It'll be Jingle pie, and goat curry for those poor babies.
translation.zh: 那些可怜的宝宝只能成为盘中餐了

translation.en: That'll fix it.
translation.zh: 这样就好了

translation.en: You're a lifesaver. Thank you.
translation.zh: 你真是救我命了 谢谢

translation.en: -All the best, Mr. Cunningham. Bye-bye. -Bye-bye.
translation.zh: -祝你好运 坎宁翰先生 再见-再见

translation.en: -Thanks again! -[Barry] Bye!
translation.zh: -拜拜-谢谢 再见！

translation.en: It's okay, Rudolph.
translation.zh: 没关系 鲁道夫

translation.en: -What's going on? -[Miss Ashley] Rudolph's in pain.
translation.zh: -怎么了？-鲁道夫很痛苦

translation.en: Has he eaten something bad? Has he got a bad stomach?
translation.zh: 它吃坏东西了吗？它是肚子不舒服吗？

translation.en: His farts have been really stinky lately, haven't they?
translation.zh: 它的屁最近很臭 是吧？

translation.en: Really stinky.
translation.zh: 真的很臭

translation.en: I can prescribe him some painkillers if he's off his food.
translation.zh: 如果他还不吃东西我可以给它开些止痛药

translation.en: -Can Miss Ashley stay for dinner tonight? -Well, not tonight.
translation.zh: -阿什莉小姐今晚能留下吃晚餐吗？-今晚不行

translation.en: It's just I've got all those leftovers from yesterday,
translation.zh: 我还有昨天的剩菜呢

translation.en: and I need to do my work.
translation.zh: 而且我得工作

translation.en: Well, maybe you should look up from your work sometimes, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: 也许你时不时该停下工作抬头看看 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: -Do that. Look up. Go on. -[Buster] Yeah, look up, Daddy.
translation.zh: -就这样 抬头看 看吧-是啊 抬头看 爸爸

translation.en: -Look up! -[kids] Up, up, up!
translation.zh: -看-上面！ -上面！-往上看 上面！

translation.en: Huh. Who put that there?
translation.zh: 谁放在这里的？

translation.en: I think I'm just gonna go and check up on the goats. Yeah?
translation.zh: 我去看看山羊 好吗？

translation.en: I-I think I'm just gonna go and check on Miss Ashley.
translation.zh: 我去看看阿什利小姐

translation.en: Oh, yes, well done, Rudolph.
translation.zh: 干得好 鲁道夫

translation.en: Bravo, my friend, bravo.
translation.zh: 太棒了 我的朋友 太棒了

translation.en: You're a star. You're a star, my friend!
translation.zh: 你真是个明星 我的朋友！

translation.en: -[Miss Ashley sighs] -[Matt] Hi. Don't worry about Rudolph. He's okay.
translation.zh: -嗨-别担心鲁道夫 它没事

translation.en: -Oh, good. -Prescription for Billy the goat.
translation.zh: 很好 给山羊比利的处方

translation.en: Bad tooth.
translation.zh: 坏牙

translation.en: Someone's been feeding him sweets.
translation.zh: 有人喂它吃糖了

translation.en: Oh, it's Buster. Lollipops.
translation.zh: 是巴斯特 棒棒糖

translation.en: Although apparently Buster likes sprouts now.
translation.zh: 但巴斯特现在喜欢吃芽菜了

translation.en: Much healthier.
translation.zh: 健康多了

translation.en: It's obvious they like each other. Why didn't they kiss under the mistletoe?
translation.zh: 他们显然喜欢彼此为什么不在槲寄生下接吻？

translation.en: And I think we need to reunite Holly with the kids again. She's much stronger.
translation.zh: 我们该让霍莉跟小羊们重聚了它强壮多了

translation.en: Oh. I was enjoying looking after the little ones.
translation.zh: 我还挺喜欢照顾小羊羔呢

translation.en: The man who's not really an animal person suddenly finds his heart.
translation.zh: 不喜欢动物的人突然有心了

translation.en: I wouldn't go that far.
translation.zh: 那倒不至于

translation.en: It's just since my heart broke, I've tried not to use it, you know?
translation.zh: 自从我心碎之后 我就尽量不动心

translation.en: -Have a good evening. -Yeah. Yeah, you too.
translation.zh: -祝你晚上愉快-你也是

translation.en: Don't you think the stars shine brighter in the countryside?
translation.zh: 你们不觉得乡下的星星更闪亮吗？

translation.en: Well, there's more sky, so there's more stars.
translation.zh: 这里有更广阔的天空所以有更多的星星

translation.en: Makes you feel like you're being watched over, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 让人觉得有人在照顾自己 是吧？

translation.en: What do I do?
translation.zh: 我该怎么办？

translation.en: Should I stay?
translation.zh: 我该留下吗？

translation.en: Give me a sign.
translation.zh: 给我个启示

translation.en: [Charlie] Hi, Dad.
translation.zh: 嗨 爸爸

translation.en: Charlie, are you knitting? You're meant to be asleep.
translation.zh: 查理 你在织毛衣吗？你该睡了

translation.en: I need to get it done, Dad.
translation.zh: 我得把它做完 爸爸

translation.en: -What is it? A present? Is it for me? -It's for Kayla.
translation.zh: 是什么？礼物吗？ -是给我的吗？-是给凯拉的

translation.en: -What are these? -They're for the triplets.
translation.zh: -这是什么？-是给三胞胎的

translation.en: Miss Womble knitted them. She's gonna knit one for Jingle.
translation.zh: 是沃博小姐织的 她要给叮当织一个

translation.en: Well, they are very lucky little goats.
translation.zh: 它们真是幸运的小山羊

translation.en: They're going back into the barn tonight, so these are gonna keep them warm.
translation.zh: 他们今晚要回谷仓 这能帮它们保暖

translation.en: There we go. There we go.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Star, come on.
translation.zh: 星星 来吧

translation.en: -Let's see if you can latch on. -Go on, Star.
translation.zh: -看你能不能自己喝奶-加油 星星

translation.en: -[Matt] Come on. That's it. -[gasps] [Matt] That's it!
translation.zh: 来吧 就这样

translation.en: -Yes, she did it. -That's fantastic. Okay. Here we go.
translation.zh: -它做到了-就这样 太棒了 好 去吧

translation.en: Snowy's turn. Go on, Snowy. Go on. Don't be nervous.
translation.zh: 该白雪了 去吧 白雪 去吧 别紧张

translation.en: -Come on, Snowy. -That's it. Go on.
translation.zh: -加油 白雪-就这样 加油

translation.en: -That's it. You're doing it, Snowy. -Yeah, he did it!
translation.zh: -就这样 你做到了 白雪-它做到了

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: Okay, Sarah, come on.
translation.zh: 好 莎拉 来吧

translation.en: Off you go. Go on.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: -Go on, Sarah. -Do it for Mum, Sarah.
translation.zh: -去吧 莎拉-为了妈妈 莎拉

translation.en: -[Matt] Go on. -Come on, Sarah. You can do it.
translation.zh: -去吧-加油 莎拉 你可以的

translation.en: [Matt] Come on.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: That's right, Sarah.
translation.zh: 很好 莎拉

translation.en: -That's it. You've nearly got it. -You're nearly there.
translation.zh: -就这样 差不多了-差不多了

translation.en: Sarah!
translation.zh: 莎拉！

translation.en: [Matt] You've done it!
translation.zh: 你成功了！

translation.en: -Sarah, you've done it! -[kids cheer]
translation.zh: 莎拉 你成功了！

translation.en: You good girl. You're such a good mum.
translation.zh: 真棒 你真是个好妈妈

translation.en: How about you go back to bed? I'll stay with Holly and the kids all night.
translation.zh: 孩子们 你们回去睡吧我今晚留下 陪霍莉和小羊们

translation.en: Well done, Sarah.
translation.zh: 做得好 莎拉

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你们

translation.en: Love you.
translation.zh: 爱你

translation.en: You did really well with them goats.
translation.zh: 坎宁翰先生 你把小羊照顾得很好

translation.en: -Do you wanna sleep in my hammock? -You just want to sleep in my bed.
translation.zh: -你今晚想睡我的吊床吗？-你是想睡我的床吧

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: I'm gonna snuggle down here, nice and cozy like a piglet. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我要像只小猪一样 舒服地窝在这里

translation.en: What was he like?
translation.zh: 他是什么样的人？

translation.en: My dad. I'm wearing his clothes. I don't know anything about him.
translation.zh: 我爸 我穿着他的衣服却对他一无所知

translation.en: He was a bit like Arnie the pig.
translation.zh: 他有点像小猪阿尼

translation.en: Like, big and cuddly.
translation.zh: 又大又可爱

translation.en: He loved nature, loved animals. He loved the stars too.
translation.zh: 他喜欢大自然 也喜欢动物 他还喜欢星星

translation.en: He used to say no matter how dark it got, there was always stars to light the way.
translation.zh: 他曾经说 无论天多黑总有星星照亮前路

translation.en: If he was so wonderful, how come he just left me?
translation.zh: 如果他那么好 他为什么离开了我？

translation.en: -Different priorities. -Gets a job in America, never looks back.
translation.zh: 有别的要事得去做 对 去美国工作 再不会回头

translation.en: -Like I didn't exist. -He loved you though.
translation.zh: -就像我不存在-但他爱你

translation.en: He didn't try and find me when he came back.
translation.zh: 那他回来后 怎么没来找我？

translation.en: He did. Loads of times.
translation.zh: 他找过 很多次

translation.en: But the letters always got returned. Hang on.
translation.zh: 但他的信总被退回来 等一下

translation.en: Here you go.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: What…
translation.zh: 什么

translation.en: But… but this is the wrong address.
translation.zh: 这地址是错的

translation.en: We moved after he left.
translation.zh: 他走后我们搬家了

translation.en: He didn't know that. He just thought you didn't wanna know him.
translation.zh: 他又不知道他只是以为你不想了解他

translation.en: I might not be the best dad in the world, but I would do anything for my children.
translation.zh: 我可能不是世界上最好的爸爸但我愿为我的孩子做任何事

translation.en: If these letters had come back to me,
translation.zh: 要是这些信被退回给我

translation.en: I would've gone to the ends of the earth to find my kids.
translation.zh: 我会走到天涯海角找我的孩子

translation.en: He obviously just didn't want to find me.
translation.zh: 他显然只是不想来找我

translation.en: Good night, Mary. Good night, Bright.
translation.zh: 晚安 玛丽 晚安 布莱特

translation.en: -Good night, Billy. -[bleating]
translation.zh: 晚安 比利

translation.en: Good night, donkey number one. Good night--
translation.zh: 晚安 一号驴 晚安 二号…

translation.en: -Please go to sleep. -Goodnight, Farmer Cunningham.
translation.zh: -拜托 睡吧-晚安 坎宁翰农夫

translation.en: Good morning, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: 早上好 坎宁翰先生

translation.en: Come on, sleepyhead.
translation.zh: 来吧 瞌睡虫

translation.en: Come on now. Come on. Me and the kids are going wild swimming. Wanna come?
translation.zh: 来吧 来吧 我和孩子们要去游泳 想来吗？

translation.en: -It's brilliant for your circulation. -I've told you. I can't!
translation.zh: -对血液循环很有好处-我说过 我不能去

translation.en: My boss could turn up any day now.
translation.zh: 我的老板随时可能来

translation.en: It's the weekend. Bosses don't work weekends.
translation.zh: 今天是周末 老板周末不上班

translation.en: We've got lots of activities lined up, and tonight is the Christmas fair.
translation.zh: 我们跟村民安排了很多活动今晚是圣诞集市

translation.en: No, she's on the warpath. She wants my blood.
translation.zh: 不 她气坏了 她要宰了我

translation.en: Oh, fine, go and stew in your own work juice,
translation.zh: 好吧 闷头工作去吧

translation.en: and do not forget that Christmas tree, okay?
translation.zh: 别忘了那棵圣诞树 好吗？

translation.en: The village square won't be the same without it. Capisce? Thank you.
translation.zh: 没有它 村广场就不一样了知道吗？谢谢

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 干什么？

translation.en: Sorry, Popsicle. I guess I'm not the son you wanted me to be,
translation.zh: 抱歉 老爸 看来我不是你想要的儿子

translation.en: but you weren't exactly the dad I wanted either.
translation.zh: 但你也不是我想要的爸爸

translation.en: [Matt] Not you again. You see this?
translation.zh: 不 你怎么又来了 看到了吗？

translation.en: This is the answer to all my prayers, and you will be out of my life forever.
translation.zh: 这是我一切问题的答案你要永远离开我的生活了

translation.en: Right. Give me that back.
translation.zh: 还给我！

translation.en: -[Billy bleats] -Let go of it.
translation.zh: 放开

translation.en: -[Billy bleats] -Right. I need…
translation.zh: 我需要…

translation.en: Right. Come here. Come back. Come back!
translation.zh: 过来 回来！

translation.en: Oh, it's lovely! It's lovely and warm. Yes, you're in!
translation.zh: 太棒了！ 挺暖和的 你们进来了

translation.en: Just give me the leaflet. Come on. We're friends, aren't we? Old friends.
translation.zh: 把宣传单给我 来 我们是朋友吧？我们是好朋友

translation.en: Give me that. Yes! Ha ha!
translation.zh: 给我 太好了！

translation.en: Thought you could outsmart Matt Cunningham? Well, you can't,
translation.zh: 我以为你比马特坎宁翰聪明？做梦

translation.en: because these guys…
translation.zh: 因为他们…

translation.en: Hang on. Give that back. Oi, hang on. Give me that back!
translation.zh: 等等 还给我 等等 还给我！

translation.en: Right. Give it. Come here!
translation.zh: 给我 过来！

translation.en: Give me that! Where's he going? Come here. I've got you! Come here!
translation.zh: 给我！ 它要去哪里？ 过来 我抓到你了！过来！

translation.en: [laughs] And that is how you do it.
translation.zh: 这就对了

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: I need some of your mistletoe, the magic stuff.
translation.zh: 我需要点你的槲寄生和魔法

translation.en: -What? -The stuff that makes 'em want to kiss!
translation.zh: -你说什么呢？-让人想接吻的东西！

translation.en: Sorry, I'm in the middle of something. Come back later?
translation.zh: 抱歉 我有事 你回头再来吧？

translation.en: It might be too late. She might've gone off with someone else!
translation.zh: 那可能就太迟了她可能跟别人走了！

translation.en: Gone off with… Here. Here. Take this.
translation.zh: 跟人…来 拿这个

translation.en: Thank you! [laughs gleefully]
translation.zh: 谢谢！

translation.en: Welcome to the Cobbledon Players.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到柯布顿戏剧

translation.en: I think it's fair of me to say that my productions here
translation.zh: 我觉得可以说 我的作品

translation.en: are really pretty legendary.
translation.zh: 相当传奇

translation.en: Now let's just start off
translation.zh: 首先

translation.en: by getting you to tell me what acting experience you've got. Anybody?
translation.zh: 你们先告诉我你们有什么表演经验 有人吗？

translation.en: I was going to be in the Christmas play at school.
translation.zh: 我本来要参加学校的圣诞剧

translation.en: I'm afraid "going to be" doesn't quite cut the mustard.
translation.zh: 恐怕“本来要”可不够格

translation.en: When I was in The Mousetrap…
translation.zh: 我演《捕鼠计》时

translation.en: …what we would always do is we would elongate our words for dramatic effect.
translation.zh: 我们说话时会拖长声达到戏剧性的效果

translation.en: We'd also leave great big, long pauses after every three or four words.
translation.zh: 而且每说三 四个字我们就会进行很长的停顿

translation.en: Then we'd have lots of double takes.
translation.zh: 我们还会进行很多重拍

translation.en: I'll show you this actually. Listen and learn.
translation.zh: 我做给你们看 听着学着

translation.en: I am a genie,
translation.zh: 我是个精灵

translation.en: and I live in a lamp.
translation.zh: 我住在灯里

translation.en: But look!
translation.zh: 但看！

translation.en: Who goes there?
translation.zh: 来者何人？

translation.en: Could it be
translation.zh: 难道是

translation.en: Aladdin?
translation.zh: 阿拉丁？

translation.en: Now let's give you a little go.
translation.zh: 你来试试吧

translation.en: I am a genie,
translation.zh: 我是个精灵

translation.en: and I live in a lamp.
translation.zh: 我住在灯里

translation.en: You see, I didn't believe a word of that.
translation.zh: 你瞧 这完全没有说服力

translation.en: Lovely. You will go far.
translation.zh: 很好 你会大有前途

translation.en: Gerald, maybe we should focus more on the hoedown this year.
translation.zh: 杰拉德 我们今年还是专注于土风舞吧

translation.en: We can teach them how to speak hoedown and line dancing.
translation.zh: 我们可以教他们说土话 跳列队舞

translation.en: But my production--
translation.zh: 但我的作品…

translation.en: Can take a backseat this year, for the sake of the children.
translation.zh: 今年就退居其次吧 为了孩子们

translation.en: You all want to be part of the hoedown, right?
translation.zh: 你们都想参与土风舞吧？

translation.en: -Yes. -Oh, absolutely!
translation.zh: -是的-当然！

translation.en: If you wanna go to the hoedown,
translation.zh: 如果你想参加土风舞

translation.en: we need to teach you how to walk the walk and talk the talk.
translation.zh: 我们得教你们怎么走 怎么说

translation.en: Hit it!
translation.zh: 音乐！

translation.en: Come on, everybody. Clap your hands. It's the Cobbledon Christmas hoedown.
translation.zh: 来吧 大家拍手 这是柯布顿圣诞土风舞

translation.en: Now, y'all need to be hoedown ready for the Cobbledon Hoedown Snowdown.
translation.zh: 你们得为柯布顿瑞雪土风舞做好准备

translation.en: -Say Cobbledon. -[all] Cobbledon!
translation.zh: -说柯布顿-柯布顿！

translation.en: Say Christmas!
translation.zh: 说圣诞节！

translation.en: Christmas!
translation.zh: 圣诞节！

translation.en: -Say Cobbledon Christmas! -Cobbledon Christmas!
translation.zh: -说柯布顿圣诞节！-柯布顿圣诞节！

translation.en: -Say hoedown! -[all] Hoedown!
translation.zh: -说土风舞！-土风舞

translation.en: -Say snowdown! -[all] Snowdown!
translation.zh: -说瑞雪！-瑞雪！

translation.en: -Say yee-haw! -[all] Yee-haw!
translation.zh: -说嘿呀！-嘿呀！

translation.en: -Say ooga-ooga-ooga! -[all] Ooga-ooga-ooga!
translation.zh: -说嘎嘎嘎-嘎嘎嘎！

translation.en: -Say buckaroo! -[all] Buckaroo!
translation.zh: -说牛仔！-牛仔！

translation.en: Now you're speakin' hoedown too.
translation.zh: 现在你们也会土话了

translation.en: ♪ And let it snow down, hoedown ♪
translation.zh: 下雪吧 土风舞

translation.en: ♪ Come on in ♪
translation.zh: 在柯布顿

translation.en: ♪ Everybody's waitin' For the Snowdown to begin ♪
translation.zh: 大家都在等待瑞雪降临

translation.en: ♪ So let it snow down, hoedown ♪
translation.zh: 所以下雪吧 土风舞

translation.en: ♪ Come on, let's go ♪
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: ♪ Christmas kisses with the mistletoe ♪
translation.zh: 槲寄生下的圣诞之吻

translation.en: ♪ And let it snow… ♪
translation.zh: 下雪吧

translation.en: Barney tells us your barn roof needs fixing.
translation.zh: 邮政所长巴尼告诉我们你的谷仓屋顶需要修了

translation.en: Happy to take a look, see if we can fix it up.
translation.zh: 我很乐意去看看能不能修好

translation.en: There's no point fixing the roof when the barn's gonna get knocked down.
translation.zh: 没必要修了 谷仓反正也要拆掉

translation.en: -Knocked down? -That's the phone, the office.
translation.zh: -拆掉？-电话响了 办公室

translation.en: So I've got to…
translation.zh: 我得去…

translation.en: But thank you for your interest.
translation.zh: 谢谢你关心

translation.en: -♪ I really wanna kiss Miss Nerris ♪ -♪ Just go ahead, don't be embarrassed ♪
translation.zh: 我真的很想亲内瑞斯老师 来吧 别不好意思

translation.en: ♪ I got the magic mistletoe ♪
translation.zh: 我拿了魔法槲寄生

translation.en: ♪ Kiss me quick, and you can go 'Cause this ain't my first rodeo ♪
translation.zh: 快吻我 然后就走吧这可不是我的第一次

translation.en: ♪ And let it snow ♪
translation.zh: 下雪吧

translation.en: Yee-haw!
translation.zh: 咦哈！

translation.en: Mr. Cunningham's gonna knock the barn down, tear it all down!
translation.zh: 坎宁翰先生要拆掉谷仓 全部拆掉！

translation.en: "I hope you will make a visit to Mistletoe Farm
translation.zh: “希望您造访槲寄生农场

translation.en: at your earliest convenience so that we can make an acceptable deal
translation.zh: 越快越好 我们好达成可以接受的交易

translation.en: and I can hand over the property to you for redevelopment
translation.zh: 我也可以把这块地交给你们进行再开发

translation.en: as soon as possible."
translation.zh: 越快越好”

translation.en: "Yours sincerely, Mr. Cunningham."
translation.zh: “真诚的 坎宁翰先生”

translation.en: [town crier] Oyez, oyez!
translation.zh: 肃静！

translation.en: Welcome to the village Christmas fair!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到乡村圣诞集市

translation.en: [Miss Womble] He's here with the tree!
translation.zh: 他带树来了

translation.en: Your dad's here, kids. Go! Come on, let's go and see him.
translation.zh: 你们爸爸来了 孩子们 走吧！去见他

translation.en: Yes. Quick, quick, quick, quick!
translation.zh: 好 快点！

translation.en: Oyez, oyez!
translation.zh: 肃静！

translation.en: Now for the main event.
translation.zh: 现在是重头戏

translation.en: The generous donation of the Christmas tree from Mistletoe Farm!
translation.zh: 槲寄生农场慷慨地捐赠圣诞树！

translation.en: ♪ Peace on earth and mercy mild ♪
translation.zh: 天人从此长融洽

translation.en: ♪ God and sinners… ♪
translation.zh: 恩宠平安

translation.en: ♪ Reconciled! ♪
translation.zh: 被万方

translation.en: ♪ Joyful all ye nations rise ♪
translation.zh: 起啊 万国众生灵

translation.en: ♪ Join the triumph in the skies ♪
translation.zh: 响应诸天歌颂声

translation.en: ♪ Mr. Cunningham's on his way ♪
translation.zh: 坎宁翰先生来了

translation.en: ♪ Got a big tree upon his sleigh ♪
translation.zh: 他的雪橇上有棵大树

translation.en: ♪ Hey! Hark! the herald angels sing ♪
translation.zh: 天使高声唱

translation.en: ♪ Glory to the Cunningham's kin ♪
translation.zh: 荣耀归与坎宁翰家

translation.en: That is not a forest tree.
translation.zh: 那不是森林树

translation.en: Hey, that's from our school.
translation.zh: 那是我们学校的

translation.en: -We gave it to you. -That's our tree.
translation.zh: -是我们给你的-那是我们的树

translation.en: Oyez, oyez.
translation.zh: 肃静！

translation.en: He is a traitor.
translation.zh: 他是个叛徒

translation.en: He's selling the farm to the developers!
translation.zh: 他要把农场卖给开发商！

translation.en: -What? -No!
translation.zh: -什么？-不！

translation.en: [villagers] No!
Okay, I've spoken to the developers.
translation.zh: 好吧 我是跟开发商谈过了

translation.en: I've made an appointment, and they're going to buy the farm,
translation.zh: 我已经预了约 他们要买下农场

translation.en: and there's nothing that any of you can do about it.
translation.zh: 你们都无法阻止

translation.en: Mr. Cunningham, you may have given up on us,
translation.zh: 坎宁翰先生 你可能放弃了我们

translation.en: but we refuse to give up on you.
translation.zh: 但我们拒绝放弃你

translation.en: [villager] Yes.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: And I made that jumper for you with your face on it.
translation.zh: 我还给你织了有你脸的毛衣

translation.en: What…
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Is that meant to be me? -It's flattering.
translation.zh: -那是我吗？-很好看

translation.en: How does this look anything like me?
translation.zh: 这看起来像我吗？

translation.en: -I wouldn't put this on a goat! -It wouldn't fit it.
translation.zh: -我都不会让山羊穿-也穿不下

translation.en: They say it takes a village to raise a child, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: 人们说养一个孩子需要一整个村子坎宁翰先生

translation.en: This village is raising yours. The least you can say is thank you.
translation.zh: 这个村子在养你的孩子你至少该说句谢谢

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -Kids, we're going. -I don't want to go!
translation.zh: -孩子们 我们走吧-我不想走！

translation.en: Guys.
translation.zh: 孩子们

translation.en: I don't wanna go, Dad.
translation.zh: 我不想走 爸爸

translation.en: Go and get in the car.
translation.zh: 上车去

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We can't just let him sell the farm.
translation.zh: 我们不能让他卖掉农场

translation.en: The village without a farm will be like Cobbledon without Christmas.
translation.zh: 没有农场的村子就像没有圣诞节的柯布顿

translation.en: I say we stage a protest.
translation.zh: 我们应该进行抗议

translation.en: We can appeal to Mr. Cunningham's sensitive side.
translation.zh: 我们可以唤起坎宁翰先生敏感的一面

translation.en: He doesn't have a sensitive side from what I can see.
translation.zh: 在我看来 他没有敏感的一面

translation.en: You know what they say about killing with kindness.
translation.zh: 但这值得一试 人们说 善意是武器

translation.en: Let's show him how really kind we can be.
translation.zh: 让他看看我们有多善良

translation.en: I don't think he realizes how much he needs us,
translation.zh: 我觉得他没意识到他有多需要我们

translation.en: and he's gonna be so lonely this Christmas.
translation.zh: 他这个圣诞节会很孤单的

translation.en: ♪ Try to imagine A house that's not a home ♪
translation.zh: 想象一栋不像家的房子

translation.en: ♪ Try to imagine a Christmas all alone ♪
translation.zh: 想象一个单独的圣诞节

translation.en: ♪ That's where I'll be since you left me ♪
translation.zh: 你离开我之后 我就是如此

translation.en: ♪ My tears could melt the snow ♪
translation.zh: 我的眼泪能将雪融化

translation.en: ♪ What can I do without you? ♪
translation.zh: 没有你 我要怎么办？

translation.en: ♪ I've got no place, no place to go ♪
translation.zh: 我无处可去

translation.en: [all] ♪ It'll be lonely this Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 这个圣诞节会很寂寞

translation.en: ♪ It'll be lonely this Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 这个圣诞节会很寂寞

translation.en: ♪ Lonely and cold ♪
translation.zh: 寂寞又寒冷

translation.en: ♪ It'll be cold, so cold ♪
translation.zh: 会很冷很冷

translation.en: ♪ This Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 这个圣诞节

translation.en: Okay, well, thank you. That's very… nice.
translation.zh: 很好 谢谢 真不错

translation.en: ♪ You remember last year When we were all so sad? ♪
translation.zh: 你可记得去年 我们多么伤心

translation.en: ♪ When we thought the pain Would never ever end ♪
translation.zh: 我们以为痛苦永远不会结束

translation.en: ♪ I remember looking at you, Dad ♪
translation.zh: 我记得我看着你 爸爸

translation.en: ♪ I remember thinking That Christmas is all made for us ♪
translation.zh: 我记得我想 圣诞节就是为我们存在

translation.en: ♪ Dad, this is the time of the year That you really, you really need love ♪
translation.zh: 爸爸 这是一年中你最需要爱的时候

translation.en: ♪ When it means so very, very much ♪
translation.zh: 因为这时爱格外珍贵

translation.en: [all] ♪ It'll be cold, so cold ♪
translation.zh: 会很冷很冷

translation.en: ♪ This Christmas ♪
translation.zh: 这个圣诞节

translation.en: Okay, thank you, kids. Inside.
translation.zh: 好了 谢谢 孩子们 进去吧

translation.en: They were the only ones that could sing in tune.
translation.zh: 只有他们在调上

translation.en: -Oh! -What?
translation.zh: -哦！-什么？

translation.en: Meet me in the barn first thing.
translation.zh: 明天一早去谷仓见我

translation.en: We're gonna stop those developers. Make sure you tell the others.
translation.zh: 我们要永远阻止那些开发商一定要告诉其他人

translation.en: -[both] Yes. -Yes.
translation.zh: -好-好

translation.en: [Beano] Get down.
translation.zh: 趴下

translation.en: We've spotted the vehicles.
translation.zh: 我们看到了车辆

translation.en: I repeat, we've spotted the vehicles. Enemy incoming. I repeat, enemy incoming.
translation.zh: 我再说一遍 我们看到了车辆 敌人来了 我重复 敌人来了

translation.en: You've got to turn it on, Beano.
translation.zh: 你得打开它 比诺

translation.en: Enemies incoming. Get to your positions ASAP.
translation.zh: 敌人来了 立刻各就位

translation.en: H-I-J-K-L-M-N-O-P.
translation.zh: 立刻马上

translation.en: -Now! -Now!
translation.zh: 快去！

translation.en: Okay. Over and out.
translation.zh: 好 通话完毕

translation.en: Hello. Ah, you found it okay.
translation.zh: 你们好 你们找到了

translation.en: -Mr. Cunningham, hi. -Hi, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.zh: -坎宁翰先生-坎宁翰先生

translation.en: -Marlon. -He's Marlon Morris. I'm Louis.
translation.zh: -我是马龙-他是马龙莫里斯 我是路易

translation.en: -Louis Drake. -That's me.
translation.zh: -路易德雷克-就是我

translation.en: -Okay. Love the place. It stinks. -It stinks. It reeks. Must be intolerable.
translation.zh: -好 喜欢这地方 臭死了-臭死了 臭死了 一定让人无法忍受

translation.en: -Poor man. -Oh, your nostrils!
translation.zh: -可怜人-你的鼻子啊！

translation.en: -Wanna start in the house? -Let's. Come on, boys.
translation.zh: -要先看看家里吗？-先去家里看看 走 跟我来

translation.en: Good idea. Nice to be back. Love to your papa.
translation.zh: 好主意 很高兴再来 向你爸问好

translation.en: Charlie is go. Repeat, Charlie is go.
translation.zh: 查理行动 再说一遍 查理行动

translation.en: Cunningham, the contract. We'd love you to just pop your signature there.
translation.zh: 坎宁翰 合同 请你在这里签名

translation.en: Have a skim. Don't worry about the small print.
translation.zh: 浏览一遍吧 细节不重要

translation.en: It's fine. I don't need to read the small print.
translation.zh: 没关系 我不需要看小字

translation.en: I'm happy to see the back of this place.
translation.zh: 我很乐意摆脱这地方

translation.en: Absolutely perfect. Now, listen, before we sign, I'd just…
translation.zh: 完美 在我们签字之前

translation.en: -I'd love to have another look round. -Yeah. No, fine.
translation.zh: -我想再到处看看-好啊

translation.en: -I can just store it safely over here. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我就把它安全地放在这里-好

translation.en: -[Louis] This is the kitchen? -[Matt] Yep.
translation.zh: -这里是厨房吧？-对

translation.en: Oh gosh!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: It's quite a smell, isn't it?
translation.zh: 这味儿好冲 是吧？

translation.en: -Trust me. It's just rotten eggs. -That is horrific!
translation.zh: 相信我 只是臭鸡蛋而已 太可怕了！

translation.en: It's the poisonous mold from the sewer pit below.
translation.zh: 是房子下面下水道里的有毒霉菌的气味

translation.en: -What? -What did you say?
translation.zh: -什么？-你说什么？

translation.en: -Didn't you tell them about the sewer pit? -No!
translation.zh: -你没跟他们说下水道的事吗？-没有！

translation.en: There is categorically no sewer pit under the--
translation.zh: 因为下面根本没有下水道…

translation.en: -What is this? -It's toxic! Agh!
translation.zh: -是什么？-有毒

translation.en: -[Marlon] What is this? -That is not poisonous.
translation.zh: 这是什么？ 那不是毒物

translation.en: It's in my eyes!
translation.zh: 进我眼睛了！

translation.en: Look, I am sorry about before. As you can see, it's a spacious bedroom.
translation.zh: 之前的事很抱歉如你们所见 这间卧室很宽敞

translation.en: Yeah, no probs. We'll move on.
translation.zh: 对 没问题 我们继续

translation.en: -Do you wanna-- -Take some measurements? Love to.
translation.zh: -你想…-测量一下吗？当然

translation.en: [clears throat] What's this? We've got a… Okay.
translation.zh: 这是什么？这是…

translation.en: -[yells] What is that? -Oh gosh!
translation.zh: -那是什么？-天啊

translation.en: -What is that? -A pig.
translation.zh: -那是什么？-是猪

translation.en: -Why is there a pig there? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -为什么那里有猪？-我不知道

translation.en: -Who keeps a pig in a wardrobe? -Why is there a pig?
translation.zh: -谁把猪放在衣柜里？-为什么里面有猪？

translation.en: [all] Leave the farm alone! Hey! Leave the farm alone! Hey!
translation.zh: 别动农场 嘿！

translation.en: So this is the barn, just up here.
translation.zh: 谷仓就在这里

translation.en: The animals spend most of their time in here.
translation.zh: 动物大部分时间都待在这里

translation.en: They absolutely love it.
translation.zh: 它们很喜欢这样

translation.en: A lot of the original features up here, which is nice.
translation.zh: 谷仓还保持着最初的样子 很不错

translation.en: Well, this is it.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: Oh, yeah, it's lovely.
translation.zh: 嗯 真好

translation.en: -Let's knock it down. -[Louis] Maybe a boutique hotel.
translation.zh: -我们把它拆掉吧-对 建座高级酒店

translation.en: Well, no, 'cause the anim… It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 不 那动物就…无所谓了

translation.en: -Have a look round, and I'll pop back. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好 我去周围看看 然后回来-好

translation.en: -Yeah. Okay, fine. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好-好

translation.en: [Louis] Yeah, see ya.
translation.zh: 好 再见

translation.en: -Drake. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -德雷克-嗯

translation.en: -Animals. -[Louis] Livestock.
translation.zh: -动物-牲畜？

translation.en: -[piglets squeal] -Who's a little pork chop?
translation.zh: 谁是小猪排？

translation.en: -Cute. [yells] -Oh, oh!
translation.zh: 真可爱

translation.en: Put it… Put it down.
translation.zh: 放下

translation.en: -I can't see! -You're fine. It's fine. A little lamb.
translation.zh: -我看不见了-你没事 看 没事 这里有只小羊

translation.en: Hello, little lamb. Can you say "mint sauce"?
translation.zh: 你好 小羊 你能说“薄荷酱”吗？

translation.en: Can you say "medium rare with onion gravy"?
translation.zh: 你能说“四分熟配洋葱汁”吗？

translation.en: Un, deux, trois!
translation.zh: 一 二 三！

translation.en: -[kids giggle] -[Marlon] Drake! Drake!
translation.zh: 德雷克！

translation.en: [all] Leave the farm alone! Hey! Leave the farm alone! Hey!
translation.zh: 别动农场 嘿！

translation.en: I mean, so this is everything. There is a wood down there.
translation.zh: 这就是一切了 那边有树

translation.en: We have crops over there, some sprouts or something.
translation.zh: 那边好像有农作物 芽菜什么的

translation.en: Yeah. I can see ice rink, theme park, retail park. What do you see?
translation.zh: 我可以想象改建成溜冰场主题公园 购物中心 你呢？

translation.en: I can't see anything after what we've been through.
translation.zh: 我们经受了这么多折磨我什么都看不到了

translation.en: It's been an absolute nightmare.
translation.zh: 真是一场噩梦

translation.en: Come on! Traitor!
translation.zh: 来吧！叛徒！

translation.en: And get off of our land, or we'll get you off!
translation.zh: 离开我们的土地

translation.en: Don't worry. It's just the local yokels, the village people.
translation.zh: 别担心 他们只是当地村民

translation.en: We've had worse protesters than this. These are little people with little lives!
translation.zh: 我们见过比他们更可怕的抗议者！他们就是没见过世面的小人物

translation.en: -Little people? Hold my coat. -No, no, no, no!
translation.zh: -小人物？拿着我的外套-不！

translation.en: -This land is not for taking! -Don't worry about her.
translation.zh: -这块地你们休想抢走-别担心她

translation.en: -She's the head of the knitting circle. -No surrender!
translation.zh: -她是编织俱乐部的负责人-绝不投降！

translation.en: Charge!
translation.zh: 冲啊！

translation.en: Let's be havin' you!
translation.zh: 来吧！

translation.en: Barry, what the hell are you playing at?
translation.zh: 巴里 你在搞什么？

translation.en: Trying to do what's best for our community.
translation.zh: 我们这是为了社区的利益

translation.en: -You won't scare them off that easy. -We might not, but they will.
translation.zh: -你们别想轻易把他们吓跑-我们或许做不到 但它们可以

translation.en: Oh my…
translation.zh: 天…

translation.en: Bye-bye!
translation.zh: 再见！

translation.en: [kid 1] That's it, get out!
translation.zh: 就这样 滚出去！

translation.en: -[kid 2] Faster! -[kid 3] Get them!
translation.zh: -快点-滚蛋！ 冲他们！

translation.en: -[kid 4] Go on! -[kid 5] Get off our farm!
translation.zh: 去吧 滚出我们的农场！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: No! Do not sign that, Farmer Cunningham.
translation.zh: 不！别签 坎宁翰农夫

translation.en: I have already signed it. They didn't,
translation.zh: 我已经签了 他们没签

translation.en: and now they don't want to buy the farm, thanks to you.
translation.zh: 现在因为你 他们不想买农场了

translation.en: You can't go back to being all work.
translation.zh: 你不能回到只知道工作的日子

translation.en: Real life is not fresh air and talking to chickens, Beano, okay?
translation.zh: 现实生活不是新鲜空气和对鸡讲话比诺 好吗？

translation.en: -People's jobs are at stake! -Your kids' happiness is too.
translation.zh: -这事关人们的工作！-还关系到你孩子的幸福

translation.en: -My kids are fine. -They miss their mum.
translation.zh: -我的孩子们没事-他们想念妈妈

translation.en: But they miss their dad more.
translation.zh: 但他们更想念爸爸

translation.en: This is business, Beano.
translation.zh: 这是生意 比诺

translation.en: Kids don't count!
translation.zh: 孩子不重要！

translation.en: We don't count?
translation.zh: 我们不重要？

translation.en: No, I… Well, it was… I was…
translation.zh: 不是… 我是…

translation.en: Oh, well, thank you. Thank you very much!
translation.zh: 谢了 非常感谢！

translation.en: This had better be the best pitch Cunningham has written,
translation.zh: 这最好是坎宁翰写过的最好的推介

translation.en: because if it's not, he will be losing a lot more than his job,
translation.zh: 否则 他要失去的就不止是工作了

translation.en: if you know what I mean.
translation.zh: 你明白我的意思吗？

translation.en: -What's that? -[Mo] That's a sheep. You know…
translation.zh: -那是什么？-那是羊 就是…

translation.en: [baas] Them ones.
translation.zh: 那个

translation.en: Ugh! What's that noxious smell?
translation.zh: 那是什么臭味？

translation.en: Oh, it's the countryside air!
translation.zh: 是乡下的空气

translation.en: [Mo coughs] What are you doing? -[Miss Fletcher] I don't like it! -[ominous music stops]
translation.zh: -你在做什么？-我不喜欢！

translation.en: -Looks like we've seen 'em off! -[villagers cheer]
translation.zh: 看来我们把他们赶走了

translation.en: Oh, maybe I spoke too soon.
translation.zh: 也许我话说得太早了

translation.en: There's more of them! They're all coming out of the woodwork!
translation.zh: 又来人了 他们都钻出来了！

translation.en: [all] Boo!
translation.zh: 嘘！

translation.en: Where is he? Where's Matthew? What have you done with him?
translation.zh: 他在哪里？马修在哪里？你们把他怎么了？

translation.en: -We don't want you here! We've had enough! -[man] Aye.
translation.zh: -我们不希望你来！我们受够了！-对

translation.en: I have driven all the way from London to here,
translation.zh: 我从伦敦一路开车来到这里

translation.en: and I demand to see him now!
translation.zh: 我要马上见到他

translation.en: We know exactly where you've come from, same place as the last idiots.
translation.zh: 我们知道你从哪里来的跟之前那帮蠢货是一处来的

translation.en: -Excuse me? -[Mo] Whoa!
translation.zh: -你说什么？-我们不想惹麻烦 好吗？

translation.en: -We don't want any trouble. -Then you've come to the wrong place.
translation.zh: -你说什么？-我们不想惹麻烦 好吗？ 那你们来错地方了

translation.en: -[Miss Fletcher] What's that? -A pig. The ones that… [snorts]
translation.zh: -那是什么？-那是猪 就是…

translation.en: -Them ones. -Yes. Just get rid of it!
translation.zh: -那个-好 把它赶走

translation.en: -Get rid of it? -Oh, I'll do it myself!
translation.zh: -赶走？-天啊 我自己来！

translation.en: -[Mo] I was gonna try and-- -Don't you dare spray perfume at that pig!
translation.zh: -我还想…-你敢冲那头猪喷香水！

translation.en: Miss Fletcher. Ignore these… yokels and come inside.
translation.zh: 弗莱彻小姐别理这些乡巴佬 进屋来吧

translation.en: -Yes, yes. -[gags]
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: There's no point in buying a farm if you don't like the smell of manure.
translation.zh: 如果你不喜欢粪味儿 就别买农场

translation.en: That pig's got more right to be here than you!
translation.zh: 那头猪比你有权利待在这里

translation.en: Agh, God, they're multiplying! [yelps]
translation.zh: 天啊 他们多起来了

translation.en: Get away from me, you filthy swine!
translation.zh: 离我远点 你个脏猪！

translation.en: Miss Fletcher, I'm so sorry! Mo, please get her out of the mud.
translation.zh: 弗莱彻小姐 我很抱歉！莫 快把她从泥地里拉出来

translation.en: D'you… Do you wanna?
translation.zh: 你来吧？

translation.en: -You're fired. -Please, don't--
translation.zh: -你被解雇了-求你 别…

translation.en: You are sacked.
translation.zh: 你被解雇了

translation.en: You are dismissed with immediate effect.
translation.zh: 你被解雇了 立即生效

translation.en: I ain't gonna sugarcoat it. You're gone. Now, Mo, heave me up!
translation.zh: 我就直说了 你滚吧 现在 莫 把我拉起来！

translation.en: Please! I've been working on the pitch. It's really good!
translation.zh: 求你！让我做什么都行我一直在写推介 我写得很好！

translation.en: -[Mo] I like what you've done. -[Matt] I need this job!
translation.zh: -我喜欢你对这里的打理-我需要这份工作！莫！

translation.en: -Sorry it didn't work out, yeah? -Mr. Cunningham. I would like a refund.
translation.zh: -很遗憾这事没成-坎宁翰先生 我想退钱

translation.en: -[Matt] What? -My one didn't work!
translation.zh: -什么？-我的这个没用！

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about!
translation.zh: 我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: Oh, Grumpy!
translation.zh: 爱生气！

translation.en: -[Beano] Mr. Cunningham. -Okay, you.
translation.zh: -坎宁翰先生-你 好啊 你

translation.en: You see that woman out there? She's not a developer.
translation.zh: 你看到外面那个女人了吗？她不是开发商

translation.en: She's my boss, okay? And now I'm sacked.
translation.zh: 她是我老板 现在我被解雇了

translation.en: So that's gone. That job has gone, and it is… It's all your fault.
translation.zh: 没了 我的工作没了 这都是你的错

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Mr. Cunningham. -No! You don't get to be sorry right now.
translation.zh: -对不起 坎宁翰先生-不！ 不 你现在不许道歉 好吗？

translation.en: After everything my kids have been through,
translation.zh: 因为我的孩子吃了那么多苦

translation.en: I can't even put a roof over their heads.
translation.zh: 我现在都养不起他们了

translation.en: -I can fix the roof. -[Matt] Not this roof!
translation.zh: -我可以修屋顶-不是这个屋顶！

translation.en: In our home.
translation.zh: 我们家的屋顶

translation.en: In our real home, with real people, in London where we live,
translation.zh: 我们在伦敦真正的家 我们住的地方

translation.en: where I now can't afford to pay the mortgage
translation.zh: 我现在还不起房贷了

translation.en: 'cause I don't have a job!
translation.zh: 因为我没工作了！

translation.en: I'll sort everything.
translation.zh: 我会解决一切

translation.en: No, no. You… you have ruined everything.
translation.zh: 不 你把一切都毁了

translation.en: You know, you need to, um, pack your bags and your hay,
translation.zh: 你去收拾你的行李和干草

translation.en: and… and get out!
translation.zh: 然后滚出去！

translation.en: Okay? Because you… you don't live here anymore.
translation.zh: 好吗？因为你不能住在这里了

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you guys.
translation.zh: 我会想你们的

translation.en: But I've gotta go.
translation.zh: 但我得走了

translation.en: I've messed up big time, okay? I'm gonna put it right.
translation.zh: 我搞砸了 好吗？ 我会拨乱反正的

translation.en: We're gonna miss you, Beano.
translation.zh: 我们也会想你的 比诺

translation.en: I don't want you to go, Beano. I don't want you to go.
translation.zh: 我不希望你走 比诺 我不希望你走

translation.en: I just brought Kayla and Kayan to say goodbye to the children.
translation.zh: 我带凯拉和卡扬来跟孩子们道别

translation.en: -Have you got a minute? -Uh, okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: The children are really upset, and what you did to Beano…
translation.zh: 孩子们很难过 而你对比诺做的事…

translation.en: What I did to Beano.
translation.zh: 我对比诺做的事

translation.en: When I said education comes in many forms, I didn't just mean the children.
translation.zh: 当我说教育有很多形式 我不仅是指孩子 坎宁翰先生你也一样

translation.en: -I meant yours too. -Right.
translation.zh: 我不仅是指孩子 坎宁翰先生你也一样 好吧

translation.en: Learning is for life, not just for Christmas.
translation.zh: 学习是一辈子的事 不是只在圣诞节

translation.en: The children have learnt so many things here.
translation.zh: 孩子们在这里学到了很多东西

translation.en: They've learnt to knit, to crochet, to sew, to sing, to have courage,
translation.zh: 他们学会了编织 钩针 缝纫唱歌 勇敢

translation.en: and to belong.
translation.zh: 还有归属感

translation.en: But when you took that school Christmas tree
translation.zh: 可当你拿走学校圣诞树

translation.en: that the children gave you from the bottom of their hearts
translation.zh: 那是孩子们真心实意送给你的

translation.en: and presented it back to them as some sort of trick,
translation.zh: 你却把它送回来 想骗过大家

translation.en: they felt betrayed.
translation.zh: 他们觉得遭到了背叛

translation.en: -That's not what I was trying to do. -You know Violet's star was on that tree?
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思 你知道那棵树上有小维奥莱特的星星吗？

translation.en: The one that she made for her mum.
translation.zh: 她给她妈妈做的那个？

translation.en: Well, that star got lost in transit,
translation.zh: 那颗星星在途中掉落了

translation.en: because you were too busy to do the right thing
translation.zh: 就因为你太忙 没空做你该做的

translation.en: and go and cut down that tree in the woods.
translation.zh: 去树林里砍棵树来

translation.en: Doing the right thing is something we teach children here in Cobbledon.
translation.zh: 我们柯布顿教孩子们做该做的事

translation.en: So you may not appreciate our village school or our village ways
translation.zh: 你可能不喜欢我们村的学校我们村的传统

translation.en: or our village people,
translation.zh: 甚至我们村的人

translation.en: but we care for your children with all our hearts.
translation.zh: 但我们是全心全意地关心你的孩子

translation.en: And so does Beano.
translation.zh: 比诺也是

translation.en: Maybe there's a lesson for you in that.
translation.zh: 也许你可以从中学到点什么

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, okay? I am sorry that I threw out Beano, but I…
translation.zh: 抱歉 我把比诺赶出去了 但…

translation.en: Oh, come on. Look… He's going to be fine, I promise you.
translation.zh: 得了 他会没事的 我保证

translation.en: He's from the countryside. The countryside is his home.
translation.zh: 他就是乡下人 乡下是他的家

translation.en: This is his home! This is all our homes!
translation.zh: 这是他的家！这是我们所有人的家

translation.en: ♪ Do you ever miss the stars? ♪
translation.zh: 你可曾想念星星？

translation.en: ♪ Do you ever miss the stars? ♪
translation.zh: 你可曾想念星星？

translation.en: ♪ Do you look up to the dark ♪
translation.zh: 你可曾抬头望向黑暗

translation.en: ♪ And wonder where they are? ♪
translation.zh: 不知道它们在哪里？

translation.en: ♪ Do you ever miss the moon? ♪
translation.zh: 你可曾想念月亮？

translation.en: ♪ And sing her melancholy tune ♪
translation.zh: 唱起它的忧郁曲子

translation.en: ♪ From years gone by? ♪
translation.zh: 那久远的曲子

translation.en: ♪ Do you ever wonder why? ♪
translation.zh: 你有没有想过为什么？

translation.en: [Matt] Beano.
translation.zh: 比诺

translation.en: ♪ …miss the stars? ♪
translation.zh: 你可曾想念星星？

translation.en: Hello, son.
translation.zh: 你好 儿子

translation.en: [Matt] Mum?
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I should've told you. I should…
translation.zh: 对不起 我应该告诉你的

translation.en: I should've given you the letters and the presents.
translation.zh: 我应该把信和礼物都给你

translation.en: Wait. So, you sent everything back to him?
translation.zh: 等等 是你把一切都寄回去了？

translation.en: Yes. He'd never turn up at Christmastime.
translation.zh: 对 他圣诞节时都不来

translation.en: Your little face waiting. He'd never turn up.
translation.zh: 你的小脸 等着他 可他就是不来

translation.en: He was upsetting us all the time. I didn't want any more of that.
translation.zh: 他总让我们难过 我不想再这样了

translation.en: ♪ Stars are everywhere ♪
translation.zh: 星星无处不在

translation.en: ♪ They're lighting up the night ♪
translation.zh: 它们点亮了夜空

translation.en: ♪ Brave the darkness and… ♪
translation.zh: 勇敢面对黑暗…

translation.en: [Matt] "Dear son, today will be your seventh birthday,
translation.zh: “亲爱的儿子 今天是你的七岁生日

translation.en: and I really hope you are happy."
translation.zh: 真心希望你开心”

translation.en: "Dear son, today will be your eighth birthday."
translation.zh: “亲爱的儿子 今天是你的八岁生日”

translation.en: "Soon it will be Christmas."
translation.zh: “很快就到圣诞节了”

translation.en: "Today will be your ninth birthday,
translation.zh: “今天是你的九岁生日

translation.en: and never a day goes by when I don't wonder how you are."
translation.zh: 我每一天都在想你过得好不好”

translation.en: "Today will be your 11th birthday,
translation.zh: “今天是你的11岁生日

translation.en: and I've enclosed a little gift for you as it's so close to Christmas."
translation.zh: 我附了 一个小礼物给你因为圣诞节将至”

translation.en: "I thought that you might like this snow globe."
translation.zh: “我觉得你可能会喜欢这个雪景球”

translation.en: "Every time you shake it up, I hope that you will think of me."
translation.zh: “每次你动摇它 希望你会想到我”

translation.en: "Dear Santa, please keep Beano safe, and ask Rudolph to look after him,
translation.zh: “亲爱的圣诞老人 请保护好比诺 让鲁道夫照顾他

translation.en: and please get Daddy to change his mind."
translation.zh: 让爸爸回心转意”

translation.en: [Charlie] "And help us spend time with our dad."
translation.zh: “帮我们陪伴爸爸”

translation.en: "Help him to stop working so we can show him he can be happy again."
translation.zh: “帮他停止工作 我们好让他知道他可以再次快乐起来”

translation.en: Oh no! The animals have escaped!
translation.zh: 不！动物都跑了！

translation.en: Someone left the gate open at the top field!
translation.zh: 有人没关通往野地的门！

translation.en: Something's wrong at Mistletoe Farm. I've got the children on the phone.
translation.zh: 槲寄生农场的动物出事了孩子们打来电话 惊慌失措的

translation.en: I'll get the horse, you get the quads.
translation.zh: 我去牵马 你们去开车

translation.en: -Stay as close to me as you can, okay? -[Rosie] Okay!
translation.zh: -尽量跟紧我 好吗？-好

translation.en: -[squeals] -Come back!
translation.zh: 回来！

translation.en: [Miss Ashley] You left the gate open! Animals have gone onto the road.
translation.zh: 你一定是没关门！动物跑到路上了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Okay, look, we have to find Beano. He can't have got that far.
translation.zh: 好 我们得找到比诺 他应该没走远

translation.en: [strains] Okay, come on. Let's do this.
translation.zh: 好 走 我们走吧

translation.en: So you see, Miss Fletcher, none of this was Mr. Cunningham's fault.
translation.zh: 弗莱彻小姐 这都不能怪坎宁翰先生

translation.en: Has it stopped talking?
translation.zh: 它停止说话了吗？

translation.en: Have we finished? Have we quite finished?
translation.zh: 结束了吗？完事了吗？

translation.en: Look. He's worked really hard on his pitch.
translation.zh: 听着 他为推介付出了很多努力

translation.en: That's the pitch?
translation.zh: 那是他的推介吗？

translation.en: It's not what a pitch looks like on paper but what a pitch has to say that counts.
translation.zh: 推介的样子不重要 内容才重要

translation.en: -Would you like me to read it to you? -Go on then. Entertain me!
translation.zh: -要我读给你听吗？-来吧 让我乐乐！

translation.en: Sorry, bit nervous.
translation.zh: 抱歉 有点紧张

translation.en: Get on with it.
translation.zh: 赶紧开始

translation.en: "You're expecting a big, impressive speech."
translation.zh: “我知道你们在期待一番精彩的讲话”

translation.en: Yes, we are.
translation.zh: 的确

translation.en: "But I want you to think about the little guy, like Mo."
translation.zh: “但我想让你们想想小人物 比如莫”

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 喂！

translation.en: "At Fletcher Consultants, we always look at the big picture."
translation.zh: “我们弗莱彻咨询公司总是着眼大局”

translation.en: "We are always thinking global,
translation.zh: “我们总是放眼全球

translation.en: but sometimes we miss the things that matter most."
translation.zh: 但有时 我们会忘记最重要的事”

translation.en: "The people that matter most."
translation.zh: “最重要的人”

translation.en: "The butcher."
translation.zh: “屠夫”

translation.en: "The baker."
translation.zh: “烘焙师”

translation.en: "The candlestick maker."
translation.zh: “蜡烛制造师”

translation.en: "The farmer. The father."
translation.zh: “农民 父亲”

translation.en: "The cleaner."
translation.zh: “清洁工”

translation.en: "The dreamer."
translation.zh: “梦想家”

translation.en: "The teacher."
translation.zh: “老师”

translation.en: "The goat."
translation.zh: “山羊”

translation.en: "The little people that make up the big picture."
translation.zh: “组成大局的小人物”

translation.en: "People like us."
translation.zh: “人们喜欢我们”

translation.en: [Beano] Rural Estates. Doesn't look very rural, does it, Rudolph?
translation.zh: 我们到了 乡村地产 看起来可不乡村 是吧 鲁道夫？

translation.en: [gasps] Developers. Developers!
translation.zh: 开发商啊！

translation.en: -Developers! -Sorry, no change.
translation.zh: 开发商啊！ -抱歉 没零钱-不 是我

translation.en: No, no, no, it's me. It's Beano, from Mistletoe Farm.
translation.zh: -抱歉 没零钱-不 是我 我是比诺 槲寄生农场的

translation.en: -Absolutely not. -No, no, no.
translation.zh: -别过来-不

translation.en: No, sir. Absolutely not.
translation.zh: 不 先生 别过来

translation.en: No, I'm here to sell it. I ju…
translation.zh: 不 我是来卖的

translation.en: Are you joking?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: Why would we go back to that treacherous place?
translation.zh: 我们为什么要回那个危险的地方？

translation.en: I still smell of egg.
translation.zh: 我身上还有鸡蛋味儿呢

translation.en: Now, listen, Marlon,
translation.zh: 听着 马龙

translation.en: what are you doing here listening to this buffoon
translation.zh: 这蠢货那么折腾我们

translation.en: after everything he put us through?
translation.zh: 你干吗还听他说话？

translation.en: None of that was Mr. Cunningham's fault. It was all my fault, and the kids.
translation.zh: 这些都不是坎宁翰先生的错 都是我和孩子们的错

translation.en: We tried to sabotage the farm so you wouldn't buy it.
translation.zh: 我们想给农场搞破坏这样你们就不会买了

translation.en: But look, Mr. Cunningham really wants to sell now. He does.
translation.zh: 但看啊 坎宁翰先生现在真的很想卖真的

translation.en: He signed here.
translation.zh: 他都签名了

translation.en: All you need to do is sign here and here, and the deal is done.
translation.zh: 你只需要在这里和这里签名交易就达成了

translation.en: Come on, Rudolph. Well, here you go. It's all yours.
